reviewText: I purchased this book bag b/c it was beautiful and spacious. My toddler is rather small therefore, it will grow with her. There are 2 bottle compartments and spacious interior for you to store, pampers, wipes, etc. it's a great bag, great price and great decor. I highly recommend :)

I've been dreaming about something like this for years.  I like to travel light and yet sometimes I would find myself wishing I could convert my small daily purse into a tote for larger items, a tablet computer or books - couldn't someone invent a convertible bag? Imagine my excitement when I finally found one!

Alas -- the idea (and the pictures advertising the item) is better than the actual product which is riddled with design flaws.  Too bad too, because this is such a neat idea!  With just a few tweeks in the design this item could be great but as it is it barely works at all.

CONS:
* This bag holds next to nothing. All I could manage to carry throughout all compartments was 3 credit cards, 4 bills, a few coins, a chapstick and a small hand sanitizer. All items were packed in EXTREMELY tight and it was hard to get anything in and out. Had they increased the dimensions of the wallet or compartments by just a tiny bit this bag would be much more useful.

* the small snap-closure pocket on the outside of the wallet section allows no room for any objects and bends the area on the interior wallet so that your credit cards bend and warp if you put anything in that pocket (there's only one spot for credit card slots -right on the wall of that compartment! They could have switched the credit card slots to the other side).  I did not over-stuff,  all I had in that pocket was the little chap-stick.  Certainly don't plan on carrying anything with any dimension in this pocket. At most you could fit a black plastic comb or a book-mark.  I don't know if it was because of the chap-stick or because of a miscalculation in sewing - but I couldn't get 1 row of the credit card slots to hold any cards at all- they seemed too narrow.

* The back pocket is lined for phones or sunglasses but the angle of the pouch and the velcro closure made me nervous about putting my touch screen phone in this pouch - it felt like it might pop open and the phone could only fit in without its little case.  (There's no other place in the purse which would accommodate a phone... so unless you have an older, tiny, light weight clam-shell phone or one you don't care about too much -- you're out of luck).  Also this pocket is only gusseted for dimension in two sides --- and flat on the bottom. What's the purpose of this?  Even less fits in and it would have been perfectly easy to make one 3rd "wall" to make the pouch bigger. Doing it this way only makes items smashed and difficult to get in or out.

* The WORST design flaw, aside from the small size of all the compartments is that getting the "tote" bag BACK into the compartment is very difficult and once unfolded, it never goes all the way flat again adding yet more ungainly bulk to the bag.  If you try to just stuff it back in, forget it.  You must fold the bag in exactly the way it came out... a feat that requires a little patience.  If you're bad at folding maps- just forget it.

* The two straps for carrying on your shoulder or around your waist  are very thin and located on either side of the main zippered area which makes it awkward to get into the wallet area.

* The bag is made of a stiff canvas material and is therefore not very light-weight.

PROS:

*When unfolded, the tote bag is much more useful and seems VERY sturdy and roomy.  -- You could use it just as a tote bag and never fold it back up with the wallet and sunglasses pouches still accessible on the exterior for trips to the beach I suppose - ...though there are more fashionable plain old totes for that purpose.

* Someone who carries only a card and some bills or coins and sunglasses to the farmers market or on garage sale trips might find this little bag quite useful.
For that reason, I marked it as a "3" instead of a 2 star - which it more deserves.

Works well; I was given one at a baby shower which didn't have the opening for the wipes to be readily available; so I returned that one (which costed more even) and bought this one! Fits everything I need for a complete diaper change thanks to the additional compartment on the front.
description: Patented Magic Bag is an everyday wallet, tote bag, fanny pack or shoulder bag. Has many compartments for cell phone, eye glasses and more. When finished using as a tote bag it folds back into zippered compartment and becomes a wallet with carrying straps or a fanny pack and shoulder bag. We have only Black magic bags in stock currently.

reviewText: I had a $150.00 Braun and this Norelco 7180XL is so much better. I get a smooth shave that I didn't get with my Braun. The Braun is well made but can't compare to the Norelco 7180XL. John In South Carolina

As expected, the new 7180XL razor delivers a close and comfortable electric shave, even though it runs much slower than earlier models.  The slow speed does make it very quiet and the new cleaning method is very handy.  Just 2 noticable disappointments:

1.  The external power supply is a rather combersome change from former Norelco products.

2.  The exclusion of a storage case is certainly an unwelcome "feature" of an otherwise good product at a premium price.

Very light electric razor.  Cuts shaving time from 10 minutes down to 3 minutes.  So a charge for 30 minutes of shaving time easily lasts a week.  When running it is as quiet as an old fashioned blade.  Does a great job very quickly and smoothly.  You don't need anything more.
description: The new Philips Norelco 7180X shaving system uses Philips' core technology to provide the world's closest rotary shave.

The Philips Norelco 7180XL Cord/Cordless Rechargeable Shaver is loaded with features that deliver a superior shaving experience. This water-resistant shaver features a reflex action system that adjusts to every curve of your face. Designed with floating heads to align the blades closer to your skin, the 7180XL allows you take full advantage of Norelco's Lift & Cut Technology for an ultra-close, smooth shave. And no shaver would be complete without a full-width, pop-up trimmer to define and shape your moustache and sideburns. The 7180XL also has a hair collection chamber to help keep your bathroom counter free of unwanted hair, and the washable stainless steel razor heads are a breeze to clean. Simple and reliable, this comfortable-grip shaver can be fully charged in less than an hour, and the handy LED charging indicator means you'll never unexpectedly run out of power. But if you do run out of juice, don't fret, the 7180XL has a six-minute Quick Charge feature that will give you enough power to finish your shave in a pinch.
title: Philips Norelco 7180XL Cord/Cordless Rechargeable Shaver

reviewText: I usually use Mac brushes and decided to get this kit just to have some extra brushes to use.  I love them! They are awesome quality.  The only reason I did not give them 5 stars is becuase the case is a little smelly! Like chemicals.

So i just let them air out and it's gone away not fully but hopefully after i clean them it won't be there. They are a good quality brush, i haven't used them yet though. I'll comment when i do use them.

I just got this brush set today and I must say I absolutely LOVE it! The brushes are very soft -with the exception of a few which are meant to be more stiff than the others- and came neatly wrapped in individual plastic coverings. I've yet to find them damaged at all. On top of that, I'm really digging the variety of brushes. There's one for practically everything which, of course, I'd expect from a 32 count set. My only complaint is the overwhelming plastic/moth-ball smell of the case that seems to get on everything. Thankfully though it's nothing that cant be fixed. I'm currently airing it out and am getting ready to give the brushes a quick washing with a recipe I got from makeup guru Michelle Phan. Some have said that the hairs fall out easily with these sets but after testing them for myself, I haven't found a single lost hair -not even on the face brushes-. Even if I did, it's not too big of a problem. As my first set of pro brushes, I'm very impressed.

reviewText: They're a bit large on me, but I have small hands so it's not the fault of the gloves. I'd never gotten a pair like this before--usually I got the kind with cut-off fingers--but these managed to keep my hands warm even in 14*F weather! Excellent product.

Remember the old classic movie "It's A Mad Mad Mad Mad World"? It is an epic comedy made in 1963 with a stellar cast. The madcap comedy featured crazy people racing to the other coast after some fantastic prize. Every crazy thing that can happen does. This long book resembles the movie to a "T". Lots of humor and plot twists. Cassie is trying to rescue Pritkin from a curse in the previous book. Anything that can happen, does. The journey has Cassie starting to realize just what people think of her, her role in life and her power.  It turns out, she is not happy about it at all. People have not been respecting her as a person. They only see her title and power. I love this series, but I have a couple of issues with this book. First, I do think it could have been a bit shorter (514 pages). It is too easy to get lost in this book. I love to read and do not have a problem finishing books quickly. However, I did have to put this book down a few times for a breather. My other problem was the lack of resolution of saving Pritkin. Now we have to wait and see if she does save his life in a future book. As long as you have some time and patience, you will laugh and enjoy this book.
These gloves are cute and warm. I use them in cool/cold offices.

reviewText:
I used this product to conduct a small pheromone study in graduate school a number of years ago for a Human Sexuality class. Out of 100 participants, 20% said they felt it worked, the rest were either non-responsive or said it didn't have any effect.
The asking price at the time was around $10 a bottle, but I received free single-serving samples from the manufacturer.
Most of the studies I've read regarding pheromones in humans suggest we have very limited perception possibly due to evolution. Even though we produce pheromones naturally, we either wash them off or cover them up with fragrances, soaps, lotions, shampoos, etc. Animals and insects, however, still depend on them for attracting a mate, reproduction, and continuing the species. Some brands, however, smell pretty good from the added fragrance. Others smell like something between English Leather and horse pee.
In my opinion paying more than $10-$20 for an ounce of this brand or others is a TOTAL waste of money. Furthermore, paying $90+ a bottle is outrageous, unless it comes with a "guarantee".

The androstenone nonsense has been around since at least 2001 and not surprisingly internet marketers have cherry-picked science to make a
very weak case for this derivative of testosterone  to turn your average make "6" into Brad Pitt.

B.S.

The facts:

The ability to even perceive the odor of androsterone is in all likelihood dictated by a single odorant receptor called OR7D4.
 Not all human being s are even capable of detecting this scent for reasons that are not yet fully understood.

There are two variations of this receptor--RT/WM and RT/RT.  Those individuals possessing the RT/RT genotype have been experimentally
 proven to perceive androsterone as offensive: a foul urinous odor or one similar to heavy sweat. Those possessing the former genotype--RT/WM
report a less offensive odor, while a few suggest it similar to vanilla or a floral.

The implication of the Rockefeller study is obvious: you can't know who can detect the scent or who will find it offensive or, conversely, slightly less offensive.

Clearly, the suggestion that androsterone will attract women to men like moths to a flame is utter nonsense. It may very well be that even if you are drop-dead good looking
 with a body like a Greek God, the woman you're  attracted to you may be one who gets a whiff of a urinal when you approach her; at the same time, if you connect with a woman
"out of your league" (you're a six and she's a nine) it could be because you're sitting next to her at a bar during the Super Bowl, you're both Patriot fans and they win a nail-biter in overtime.
If she's with other girls (no boyfriend) she'll experience a rush of dopamine (The brain chemical that creates euphoria) which will give her a jolt of strong sexual feelings and you could,
under those circumstances, suddenly look like a nine to her.

The point: figure out a a way to get a girl to experience a dopamine rush and you're going to look a lot sexier to her.

If shes pretty then one thing youll notice is she smell really good. people keep thinking its suppose to get girls all up on you like the axe commercials, in reality it doesnt work that way.

reviewText: This stuff takes dried out/combination skin and instantly adds moisture and softness without ANY residue.  It does things for my skin that no other serum or moisturizer that I've tried over the last 35 years has.

I am an absolute fan of SK ii FTE. I was really skeptical at first about the claims about Pitera being an all-natural "miracle" ingredient. I won a sampler bottle (30ml) at a raffle and decided to give it a try. Anyway, what's one extra step in my regimen?

My skin broke out the first week I used it, which almost made me stop using it. My friend told me it's completely normal since that's my skin's way of releasing the toxins and renewing the top layer due to the reaction to the serum. As per her advice I religiously used it for another 3 weeks. I'm so glad I didn't stop, because after the initial reaction I began to see visible changes.

2 weeks later my skin is significantly clearer (like 90% less blemishes), more firm, and almost glowing. The best way I can describe it is as if I'm going around all day like I just washed and toned my face. I've always had huge pores on my nose and rough spots on my jawline - now these are immensely improved. I even feel confident enough to go out without makeup.

My only complaint would be that in the weeks following when I ran out of FTE (and it took a while to buy another bottle since I was waiting for it to go on sale), I noticed my old skin problems returning. I don't know about rumors that your skin gets worse than it was before using it once you stop...for me it was just that I need to maintain a regimen or else my skin will just go back to its original state which I was not happy with. It's also quite pricey, but definitely worth every dollar. Plus you only need 3-4 drops each time, if you place it on your palm and gently pat it on. I would suggest not to use a cotton pad since most of the liquid is absorbed within and is wasted. Using your hands/fingers also lets you massage your face and neck to get circulation going.

Definitely recommend this product - but do see a specialist if you have prolonged reactions more than 1 week.
Purchased this product for my mom and she loves it! She has said it changed her skin and she won't turn back. Although a bit pricey think of it as saving money at the plastic surgeons office!
description: SK-II's signature product, the much-loved and most awarded bestseller, Facial Treatment Essence has over 90% pitera, the miracle ingredient discovered over 30 years ago that remains essentially unchanged till today. Its irreplaceable formula gently exfoliates the face and helps moderate the skin surface renewal cycle. SK-II Facial Treatment Essence helps to improve the appearance of 5 dimensions of beautiful, crystal clear skin: spots are less visible, appearance of wrinkles is reduced, skin texture is more refined, firmness is improved, and radiance is beautifully elevated. Skin becomes breathtakingly crystal clear.
title: SK-II Facial Treatment Essence

reviewText: I love this Professional Styling equipment as a sudden touch up before going out. It sure makes my hair silky smooth. Glad that I bought this as this is my second one as some of the hard bristels have fallen out.
Power cable keeps disconnecting, poor quality, all attachments not fixed properly, keeps shaking while you use it. Unprofessional tool.

It stopped working almost exactly after 4 months, just like another reviewer mentioned, I initially liked it (that's why I am giving it 2 stars), but too many things started going wrong, the attachments started feeling too loose after a few uses, I tried to use it in Europe (description says it is dual voltage and I needed a drier that was dual voltage, that's one of the reasons I chose this one), I turned the little dial to the 220 V option and it sounded like it was going to burn when I tried to use it, it was working so hard, sounded much louder than usual, it seemed to be still in 110 V and getting way more voltage than it was able to handle, so I didn't dare trying to use again in Europe, I thought I had gotten a lemon and maybe the voltage switch was broken. When I got back home to the U.S I went to use it as normal (switched it back to 110V) and I was able to turn it on once, then the power switch got stuck in the OFF position and I couldn't and can't turn it ON anymore. I wanted to like it, but it proved to be poorly made.

The cleanser is made in New Zealand and contains Manuka Oil which fights micro-organisms that cause irritation and blemishes and Manuka Honey which revitalizing and stimulates cell renewal while also hydrating it is 100% natural and is cruelty free.
I purchased this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This facial cleaner is great! This is my second time using it and I can tell so much of a difference between this and my old cleanser. My face feels so refreshed and clean. I am happy to find a product that doesn't leave my face dry or oily...this is the perfect medium. I will continue using this product!

I received this item at a discounted rate for review purposes. All opinions are of my own and are unbiased.

reviewText:
As with many brands of moisturizers, it helps to go easy on the application. This product will get tacky if you use too much, so it might take some experimentation.

Living in an arid climate, this might not have enough moisture for winter time. In the warmer months, so far so good.

I don't think it's contributed to my hormonal acne, and it helps a bit with the scarring. As far as the anti aging qualities, I'm not sure, as I use Differin for acne, and that helps plump fine lines.

For more than two years, I had horribly dry skin on my face. Seriously, ridiculously dry skin. I would scrub dry flakes off and within a day or two, they'd be back. I tried moisturizers from the grocery store and very expensive, high-end moisturizers. They helped only slightly, and nothing made the flaking dry skin actually go away. I don't know how this stuff works so well, but it completely healed my dry skin. I don't have dry flakes at all anymore! Even if I skip a couple of days of use, my skin is still ok. I also have melasma, which is why I bought this to begin with. I only use it once a day, and although I would say there is a slight improvement in tone, it has not cured the melasma. But the vast improvement in my dry skin and skin texture has made me a dedicated user.

Love this product!  For people with oily skin, it is an excellent moisturizer without the greasy feeling.  It absorbs very quickly and makes your face feel hydrated.  It has good ratings on the environmental working group scale of safety for both yourself and the environment.  I have tried many of the products and love the line of skin care.
description: Diminish signs of aging and sensitivity with this oil-free, fragrance free gel hydrator. Helps reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles for soft, smooth skin without irritation. With anti-aging Pycnogenol, a gentle yet potent antioxidant that is 50 times more powerful than Vitamin E in neutralizing free radicals, this formula helps quench signs of aging while delivering soothing properties to help calm red, irritated or sensitive skin. Nourishing Vitamins A, C and E, soothing Aloe and natural astringent Witch Hazel help promote healthy, vibrant looking skin. Ideal for using alone on normal to oily sensitive skin types or for those experiencing rosacea. Also recommended for anyone who is looking for a light moisturizer or an extra nutrient boost that may be layered underneath a favorite derma e moisturizer. 100% vegan, cruelty-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, mineral oil-free, lanolin-free, gluten free, GMO-free.
Clean skin. Apply A.M. & P.M. Can be used under make-up.

reviewText: I was not happy with these nail wraps. They were very cute but absolutely terrible to peel off. They were not cut all the way through so they tore when trying to remove. Very unfortunate. Would not recommend.

This was my first time buying and using Tattify nail wraps and I love them!  They are easy to place, they have substance (not flimsy, nor too thick) and they don't have that strong chemical smell that many wraps do.  No heat or fancy tools are required to get them to look good.  The designs are crisp and clear.  I love them and I already have more in my cart.

I adore this brand of nail wraps. They create many amazingly cute designs, they are an excellent value, they last, and they are easy to apply. The only drawback to this brand is that they are a little difficult to take off the plastic.  I recommend using the pointy end of the wood rod they include in the set, then when up are able to life off a small corner, flip the wood stick to the other side to take off or use tweezers.  Then put on nail, smooth them on, file excess and remove, then place a clear coat over the top to create a more "polish" look.  Also, if you have short nails, you may want to trim a bit of the pink sprinkle of the donut so you can see the donut. Because my nails are short, I only have a tiny bit of the donut showing. I am so glad I found this brand!
title: Tattify Donut Nail Wraps - It's Worth the Calories! (Set of 22)

reviewText: Great

Doesn't deserve any of the negative reviews. They matched my natural brows perfectly, were simple to apply and remove, and lasted about 2 days each.
Some tips:
- use warm water! Apply the tattoo, dab across it with a sponge soaked in warm water, and hold it in place for about 2 minutes
- makeup remover will take these off in a heartbeat so BE CAREFUL
- brush a tiny bit of powder over them after you apply them, to keep them dry and keep the oils in your skin from ruining them
Loved these, just bought a bunch more and will continue to order regularly.
Not amazed at all

Not only is my skin completely clear but I am complemented on my skin regularly for how nice it looks. It is not drying at all but exfoliates and evens skin tone. reviewText: I like these!  After my 4 year-old repeatedly lost her glasses every 48 hours (which would take us about 24 hours to find), I purchased these.  I think that they work. I will say that she has now decided that she knows how to wear her glasses and no longer needs them.  We'll see...but if she starts losing them again, you can bet that I'll be pulling these out again!

Although these are for kids, since I am petite they fit my needs perfectly for reading and sunglasses. I pushed the plastic piece all the way to the top so that it doesn't interfere with my use of the elastic cord. I'm unintentionally rather rough with my reading glasses and sun glasses and so far these cords have not broken or become stretched out. If they can survive my care then they will be equally resilient with children. Prior to this purchase I was buying the beaded non-stretch or metal chain versions at discount stores and I was lucky if they lasted a week which over time became expensive so another reason I love this product.

reviewText: Used it right away when I got it on my 3 little boys! They love it too! Great item, thanks!

When the package came in the mail, I unwrapped it, and to my surprise, what was in the package was not the same thing as what was pictured. The cutting cape I recieved was a boys' cape with skateboarders on it. While the cape is still usable, it is not what I thought I was getting. Plus the cape I got is big enough to be a young adult cape, not a kids' cape.

1.  Good quality material.  The cape itself is made from a medium duty blend type of material.  It doesn't feel flimsy and is close to what you get at a professional barbershop.  The Velcro part is also good quality, there is stitching near the neck line to prevent itching and the Velcro itself is nice and strudy to prevent the cape from falling off.  Even if your kid tugs at it, it probably will stay on as you need more than a gentle tug to rip it off.

2.  Makes cutting hair easy.  Not only does it keeps the hair away from your kid, but the cut hair glides off the cape easily so it makes cleaning up afterward easier.  All the hair falls to the floor gently so the hair is not flying every where, this helps keep sweeping to a minimum.

3.  The price is fair.  Can you get a cheaper cape?  Yeah, probably.  But, for a few bucks more you'll get a quality cape that will last years.  I've even used the cape for myself and I'm 5'11.

I would recommend this for every one who wants to cut their kids' hair.  It make's cutting hair more pleasant for the kids and makes it easier for you too.  The only reason I knocked off one star is because the back is short, but I think that's standard for kid's cape.

reviewText: The product was fine.  The shipping charges were more than the Dentotape.  I won't order from this source again.

The type of dental floss most readily available in drugstores and supermarkets is the thin, round variety which breaks and shreds all too easily besides digging very uncomfortably into my thumb and forefinger.

Reach Dentotape by Johnson & Johnson is different. It is flat--perhaps 1/32 of an inch wide--and stronger than ordinary dental floss. It is far less prone to break or shred between your teeth--and won't dig into fingers.

The extra width does not prevent me from getting into tight places although a little extra effort is sometimes required.

Overall, this product has been very good for me. I am so glad I found it.

I buy this dental tape from an Amazon supplier because I have trouble finding it in my local pharmacy, supermarket, etc.
But the shipping charges are out of line for the size of the package and its value. Three of these cost me $9 in shipping.
Next time I will ask my pharmacy to order it for me.
description: We designed floss products to address your oral care needs and provide the clean mouth feeling you love.
title: REACH Dentotape Waxed Tape, Unflavored 100 Yards

reviewText: Exactly as advertised and fast shipping.

Five stars, guys!  It heated up in less than a minute. I pulled my hair out of a bun and ran this through it. It smoothed it but at the same time it got volume. I was really surprised at the awesomeness. My hair is fine but slightly thick. It usually has bumps from hair bands but that disappeared immediately with this hot brush. I then gave it a twist and got a totally modern "feather" but that is misleading. It was just awesome.

I bought this brush to see if it would replace having to multiple items on my head and was pleasantly surprised.  I have shoulder length hair that I use flat irons, curling irons, and brushes on and I'm forever having to give my hair a "resting" period because of the damage I cause.  This brush is meant to be used on dry hair so that was noted up front.  I always towel/air dry my hair so that eliminates dryer damage.  I have used the brush for three days now and I love it.  The brush heats up nicely in a short period of time but the bristles are cool so you don't get burnt if you accidentally touch them.  I can get the brush through my hair easily with the spacing of the bristles without snagging or pulling which is a plus.  The heating element is nice as I can simply brush out my hair and leave it straight or I can add body and bounce to it by rolling it.  As for the "healing" properties of the brush, I haven't had it long enough to comment.  I have used name brand products that cost much more and I get the same results with this brush at a much more cost effective price.  I did receive this product at a discounted price for my honest review.
title: Hot Fusion Brush

reviewText:
this is the ultimate espresso maker for travelers. i really like this product. with the hand levers you can control the brewing process with ease. it felt really sturdy and the parts don't feel cheap. however, just a couple weeks after using it, the pressure would not hold so it would just infuse water and make a big mess. note that i did not go over the pressure gauge and the latch was completely closed. all procedures were followed according to the instructions provided.i presented this problem to them, so ill get back to you if this can be fixed. overall, good product but it wouldnt be right recommend this if it breaks down in under a month. but hey, its a kickstarter project and they worked really hard to make this happen.

update: The item was sent back and promptly fixed. I really liked the customer service and how they kept you in the loop on how the problem was fixed. Because of this i have to change my grade of the Nomad as a 5 star. A lot of effort and precision was made to make this fine machine. In fact, they are already making more improvements to the machine to work even better.

Agreed! this is one Amazing, simple espresso machine.....Best espresso machine I've owned and I've gone through quite a few of the mid-range consumer pump driven units. The Nomad makes espresso on the same level as machines costing thousands of dollars. Truly a marvel of a product.

This little machine makes the most amazing espressos. What surprises me is how simple the machine is, yet it seems to be able to cope with imperfect grinding and yet still produce quality shots with a surprising amount of crema.

It's an expensive machine considering it's simplicity, but everything looks to be high quality, so I hope it lasts for a reasonable time. It's very easy to use and the pumping mechanism (the rocking lever) doesn't require lots of force to get the pressure up to the desired amount, however I do recommend using a small enough cup that fits under the nozzle so that you've both hands free to operate the pump. Clean up is pretty easy as the drawer comes out completely and can be easily rinsed.
description: Brew a cup of coffee no matter where you are with the Nomad portable espresso machine by UniTerra. With this revolutionary machine, anyone can make great espresso like a skilled barista - all you need is hot water and coffee. The manually powered Nomad requires no electricity, batteries, or gas propellant cartridges, making it one of the greenest espresso machines available. To use, simply pack finely ground coffee into the filter basket with the included tamper, fill the Nomad with boiling water, and press the pump lever until you have the desire amount of coffee.

The Nomad even has two modes of operation, allowing you to choose the one that works best for you. When used with the True Crema Valve it compensates for coffee grounds and tamping variations so that anyone can make great espresso like a skilled barista, shot after shot. When used in the classic mode, without the True Crema Valve, espresso quality is dependent on grind and tamping techniques. The perfect way to make quality espresso when away from home, the Nomad is a coffee-lover's best friend.
6-7/10 L x 6-7/10 W x 6 H, with a 10 ounce water capacity
title: Nomad Paris Red Portable Espresso Machine

reviewText:
I LOVE doing my nails - and I especially love doing nail art. But, I don't always have the time to sit down and spend hours creating unique and fantastic designs on my nails. Thankfully, I found these GORGEOUS gold stickers. They are the PERFECT addition to my nail art collection and make it easy to have stunning nails in a flash. I use them with UV gel polish (after your two coats of color and before the top clear coat), and they still look amazing 14 days later! When they first arrive, it might look like they are going to be difficult to apply. But, they are NOT!! Seriously - SO easy!

After you have your color on (you don't have to use gel like I do!), use tweezers to remove the sticker from the backing and apply it to your nail. Then, take your manicure scissors (you know, the ones with the teeny tiny tips), to gently and carefully trim around your nail and remove the part that isn't on your nail. After you're happy with how much has been trimmed away, use the beveled edge of an orange stick to make sure the sticker is fully adhered to your nail and then apply your top coat. It might look like a lot of steps, but I assure you it isn't. It is SO easy!!

Like many of you, I rely on the reviews I read here on Amazon before I buy anything. One of the reasons I shop so much on Amazon (aside from the awesomness of an Amazon Prime account with SUPER fast shipping!) is the amount of healthy customer feedback about the products sold. I like to do my part and give back to this amazing community by reviewing items Ive actually purchased and used myself. My reviews are always honest and accurate reflecting my experience. Some, definitely NOT all, of the items I review are offered to me for a discount. My opinion and review is never persuaded by this fact. I do not only review items that are sent to me at a discount either, the majority of my reviews are on items that I paid full price for. With that in mind, this item was sent to me for a discount in exchange for a review. I have thoroughly tested it and my review reflects MY thoughts on it. I hope you found my review helpful. If so, please give it a thumbs up!

I bought this product at a discounted price for review purposes. I'm not sure if I would use all of the decals because I have small nail beds but the designs are really pretty and better than I expected. I can tell that they will be easy to use because there are instructions and they are very simple. Hopefully I'll get to manipulate the size and be able use it to it's full potential.

I was a little nervous ordering these because I have gotten some very mixed results with ordering nail stickers from Amazon. But I like these a lot for a couple reasons. They stay on pretty well and each sticker has a mirror image. It drives me a little crazy when the opposing hands have an identical pattern on it. They are very long but I just stuck them on my nails and then filed off the excess. The only reason I took off one star is because on several nails, the stickers are lifting up on the corners and then get caught in my hair. I did use top coat over them so there's that.

Please know that I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for writing a review.
title: Bluezoo 3D Gloden Full Nail Art Sticker 60 Decals/sheet -YILIN 81-84 (YILIN-82Golden)

I had lost the brush that I came with my Wahl Elite Pro, which was quite cheap in my opinion. It was basically the same as the smaller brush in this package. Anyways.

These brushes was totally worth the price! (I got the at regular price)

PROS:
1.)The bristles are sturdy and strong, but not too strong. It's perfect for trying to wipe away the hair off clippers. I use the bigger one to get the bulk of the hair off my Wahl Elite Pro, and then I use the smaller one to get tighter, smaller spots.

2.) The plastic is not flimsy (at least for the big brush). It's pretty sturdy and hard plastic. I don't foresee it cracking for trying to wipe harder. I'd have to check the smaller one again, but I had no complaints with the quality of smaller one. You shouldn't apply too much pressure with that one to begin with.

3.) Packaging was pretty simple and easy to open. You just slip the back cardboard off and you can get the clippers from behind.

CONS:
1.) uhm, the smaller one I hardly use. Maybe just don't know how to use it properly. I can't use it to slip underneathe the clipper blade's small gaps beaneathe it screw which I was hoping to do. I could just unscrew the blade, but it seems clean enough for now.

1.5) I thought brushes would run cheaper, but they have good quality plastic and bristles. I think it's a fair price.

reviewText: I really cannot tell the difference between really good shampoo or cheap ones.  But i do feel good about using a product that has the ingredients this shampoo has.

This has a light scent.  It does not suds up much.  Less suds supposedly equals more moisture but I end up using double the amount to feel like I have covered all my hair. I stopped using it after a half of a bottle because it just seemed to cause build up on my scalp and my hair felt yucky.  Now I'm using it up as a hand soap. I may go back to the John Masters Honey Hibiscus shampoo which has more suds, a little goes a long way and does not cause build up even though it costs more. I just wish they weren't so pricey.

The scent of this shampoo required too much of an adjustment to keep long term...so it's a pricey option for a gentle cleanser. So long as you are not looking for a fresh scent, this shampoo might work for you.

I bought them and put them in the freezer, used them ONCE and had immediate results, my dark circles were lighter, my bags were gone. They are perfect for right after traveling, they help you look more awake after traveling 18hrs. i won't travel without them, but be careful they are made of glass.

These globes are a perfect quick fix for puffy eyes and I love the serum.  I immerse the globes in a glass of ice water for just a few minutes and they are cold and ready to use. reviewText: This product is NOT self-adhesive which I prefer. I use the Koji eyelid glue to attach it which makes it easier to re-position if necessary. I put the glue on the side of the tape that will be on the skin and leave enough tape at the outer end unglued so that I can hold it.  Once the tape is in position, I tap it lightly with a plastic dental floss stick (can't use those eyelid prong things) then apply just a little glue to the end to secure it. Has no shine like regular tape, makeup can go over it although I find that powder eyeshadow is best and I don't use tons of eye makeup.  Not completely invisible if I'm looking at it but no one has noticed-not even after I've pointed it out. The amazing thing is that it has stayed on through zumba, a shower, etc.  I have to say that I do not have monolid eyes. I have a small crease that's becoming smaller because my lid is starting to become more hooded. I use this tape to fix that which, in a way, might be harder to do because the original crease line will fight against the "new" crease line more, I think, than if you don't have a crease at all.
OPPPSS My review has jumped to a different product. The most invisible tape I've ever used. The invisibility depends also on the glue, based on my experience. Will order soon.

reviewText:
Well upon receiving this unit it was clear that it was from out of the country. The packaging says that it is a "weight loss unit" which obviously electro-stimulating muscles is not going to cause weight loss. I was just looking for a compact TENS unit to be able to use on sore and tight muscles. This unit takes 2 AAA batteries. It came with instructions that just give you basic warnings and locations for pad placement. There is really nothing about the individual unit settings and how they work for the muscles. The sensations are somewhat mild and when the unit gets turned up to a higher level it feels more like a pricking or poking sensation. The pads are also pretty small and so I would definitely recommend getting larger pads if you want to cover a larger area. I may be biased since I have used higher quality TENS units before and I know how they feel in comparison. Obviously this is a cheaper unit run on battery power so the strength and sensations you find with other machines just isn't there.

Please Note: I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. I was in no way compensated for a positive review. I am a consumer just like everyone else and I often refer to product reviews to assist in making purchase decisions. The items I review are also all items I was already wanting to buy and use on a daily basis.

If you found my review helpful please click "YES" below. I am willing to answer any questions you have before you make your purchase, just ask!

All item(s) arrived on time as expected. All contents were professionally package and in perfect condition. I would definitely purchase from this seller again in the future!

This unit could be super great if it was not so shady looking. The packaging says it is for weight loss which is ridiculous. You will not lose weight using this unit. It also does not come with great directions and the packaging stated that battaries were included but there were none in my box.

However, moving past those things the unit has potential. It is kinda like a TENS unit from my chiropractors office. TENS machines produce an electrical impulse that can be adjusted for pulse, frequency, and intensity. The exact mechanism by which it works to reduce or even eliminate pain is still unknown.  There are several possible ways TENS works. For example, TENS may inhibit (block) pain pathways or increase the secretion of the pain-reducing substances (e.g., endorphins, serotonin) in the central nervous system.

This unit is a noninvasive way to treat pain. Pain messages may be altered enough to provide temporary or even long-lasting pain relief. Besides controlling pain, this type of electrical stimulation can also improve local circulation and reduce or eliminate muscle spasm.

THis unit may  also be used for muscle soreness from overuse, inflammatory conditions, and both rheumatoid and osteo-arthritis. Athletes with painful acute soft tissue injuries (e.g., sprains and strains) may benefit from this type of treatment.

Again, it has great potential but I am sure there are better units out there if you suffer from pain. I was given a discount to provide an honest and unbiased review.

Years ago, my husband suffered a back injury at work. He was unable to perform his regular job and spent years on L&I. It was obvious that this was a life changing injury and that his back would never be the same. He saw several different doctors, underwent many different treatments, took tons of medication, endured tons of different tests and even attended a pain management clinic. Throughout this lengthy process, He was given a medical grade tens unit. It was the most effective tool he had to combat the pain. My husband went thru vocational training, attended the local community college and got himself a CDA and became a long haul truck driver rather than live on disability for the remainder of his life. Because he decided to better himself and not live on a government disability check, once his L&I case was closed, he had to return the tens unit. Of course a medical grade tens unit is ridiculously expensive and we simply cannot afford one. He has tried a few different cheap ones, but none has really done the job he's needed from it. I came across this one while browsing one day and figured it couldn't hurt to try given the fact it wasn't too costly. While it definitely doesn't work like the medical grade one, this little guy actually does a fairly decent job. Given that my husband is using this to relieve back pain and it helps, anyone looking to use this as a massager or fat burner should be extremely pleased. The unit requires two AAA batteries to work which are not included. Included with the unit a single cord that splits into four pieces, four pads that attach to the end off the cords and stick onto the body and an instruction manual. One simply plugs the cord into the unit, attaches the pads to the cord, place the pads where on the body they want massaged, pain relief or fat burner and then turn it on. It is much simpler than it looks. The unit has several different levels of intensity depending on what you are using the unit for and what your tolerance to the eletrical currents. Overall, this is a fantastic little unit that works great and has many different uses.
title: Ablevel Full Body Massager Slimming Muscle Relax

reviewText: Pretty color
Wife loves them

I love it and I hate it. Watching the youTube video on how to apply this is a must: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SUgkvYOyNIs
The first time I applied this polish, I didn't even know there was a video or special instructions for it. It was a disaster, the polish bubbled up and peel right off, like I had put elmer's glue on it. It also stains your skin and anything else it manages to get on. I love the colors and the metallic foal effect. It's worth continue to try again and again to get it right. I think I'll be looking for a no-wipe top coat to use with these as well. If the top coat is not fully cured when you go to wipe of the tacky layer, it cause what looks like water spotting on your nail. The instruction to apply this are found in the youtube video from Bundle Monster, but I will include them here as well:

Application Instructions:
1 .Prep nails by pushing back cuticles and buffing surface of nails to get rid of any natural oils and shine. Wipe nails with alcohol or nail polish remover for a clean start.
2. Apply a thin layer of base coat to prepped, oil-free nails and cure under lighting system.
3. Apply a thin layer of top coat and cure again.
4. Shake the metallic gel polish for 30 seconds to mix the metallic elements before application.
5. For best results, apply metallic gel polish using a three stroke method, starting from the center base to the free edge of nail. Be sure to not overlap each stroke when applying the metallic color gel. Cure metallic color gel for 60 seconds in a LED system (2 minutes in UV).
6. Repeat by adding another thin layer of color to nails and cure. Seal the color with a thin layer of top coat and cure.

Quick Nail Tips:
-If you have a top coat that has a sticky residue after curing wipe dry with alcohol before metallic gel application.
-For best results, thin (almost transparent), slow, non-overlapping strokes of polish while applying this metallic gel create better, even color coverage.
-Gently touch the surface of the nail after curing metallic gel to ensure the product is dry if not cure again. Drying time may significantly change according to application. When in doubt, cure again!
-Only apply top coat gel to absolutely dry cured metallic gel, applying top coat to wet/ partially wet metallic polish will not achieve the same metallic effect.
title: BMC 6pc Metallic Foil Effect Nail Art UV/LED Gel Polishes - Red Carpet Collection

reviewText: My wife picked this up for me a few years ago and I've been buying it since.  I use it on shorter hair that is moderately dry when I apply it.  You can also put on wet hair for a more gel like look though this product will still be more pliable than gel.  It only takes a small amount, isn't greasy, doesn't flake, is soft to touch.  What's not to like?

reviewText: These are the replacement puffs for the Neutrogena Healthy Skin Rejuvenator. The puffs are a little perfumy out of the box, but once you've wet them and they've lathered up a bit they aren't too bad, and the scent washes off completely when you rinse your face.  I'd give these 5 stars if they were unscented, but it's not that big a deal.  I had no problem ordering them from Amazon.

This was a christmas gift and I really like this product. After visiting literally every store in my town, I can only get the refills online and it will take 4 to 6 weeks to receive them.  I really like how my face feels after I use it.  It feels so soft and smooth.  I emailed Neutrogena regarding the refills wondering where I can buy the refills or is it true that they can only be purchased on line.

Hey you can buy the CVS brand refill pads for the Healthy skin rejuvenator by Neutrogena they are square but they work the same or you can use the refill pads for the WAVE skin cleanser they work too.

reviewText:
Wonderful soap. Bought this in a 3-pack with Patchouli and Cedar-sage versions; have also loved the Bergamot-lime. Every one of these is a winner.
Soap cleans well but is gentle. It feels smooth, rinses easily, skin feels very good afterward. Great scent that is just the right strength. This is the good stuff! I keep these fine soaps on a self-draining soap dish, since I want it to last a long time. I'm very pleased!
Great smell and feels so good on skin...not sticky and chalky like most other soaps...wonderful smell.

The square bar is too large for the normal hand, but the bar wears down quickly so it's not really an issue.  It also leaves sandy grains in the bottom of the shower from the exfoliants, which feels like you are scratching your skin.  Skin feels good after a shower.
description: Our soaps are made the old-fashioned way. They are hand-crafted using natural ingredients and include pure essential oils and organic botanicals. Known as Castile soap, our base is one of the gentlest and moisturizing of all soaps. We employ the "cold processing" method and do not add heat or chemicals to the soap pots. This process produces a bar full of natural glycerin, which is a by-product of the soap making process. Unlike most soaps on the market today, we do not remove this glycerin from our soap because it is a humectant, which helps attract moisture to the skin and can be gentle enough for even the driest and most sensitive of skin. Additionally, we do not add preservatives, colorants or fragrance oils to our products. Our soap is made with your skins well-being in mind - no harmful synthetics, just pure ingredients from nature
title: PLANTLIFE Sandalwood Soap Bar, 4 Ounce

reviewText: Definitely brighter and longer-lasting than the original Manic Panic line, but just as easy to use.  Nice stuff, worth the additional money if you're planning to have your color in for a while.

ok i been hit with a recent wave of purple love. it has become my favorite color. i decided to bleach the top of my head so that the new color would fall over my jet black hair. i followed the directions and actually left the manic panic purple haze in for 2 hours.... i really anticipated looking like barney... but i must say the second i washed it out i fell in love. it is a very rich shade not too bright but definately noticeable. i think it would go with anyones skin tone but me personally, am tan complected and it looks great. only downside is that after having it for one week without washing i noticed that some of the purple has lightened to a shade of pink. that was disappointing cause at first the solid purple looked great. i would recommend this product but if you want to keep the color up i suggest using it every week or every two weeks. manic panic rocks!

Manic Panic is the only non-permanent dye I am using now, after trying a few. It's vibrant, strong and lasts for quite a while. You need to be very careful, though, while you are applying it - it's very easy to stain bathroom surfaces (or clothes).
I don't bleach my hair prior to dying, as I want just strong highlights. I leave it on over the night, under plastic wrap and a warm hat. I love the dark purple shade! In the sun it looks fiery :)

reviewText:
I have had many Norelcos in my life.
So I can testify that when I say this shaver cuts the skin, it cuts the skin.
Norelco designed the blades in a way that negates the need for the user to get in close around lips etc...
I was bleeding in the first minute.
It seems that overall quality seems to have dropped
Blade life and battery life has descreased as well
My 6885xl has broken parts and a bad battery
Maybe I can find an older model with the older blades somewhere

About a 2 months ago I bought a Norelco Quadraction 8895xl razor. The holes and slots idea sounded pretty good to me.  However I found the Quadraction took longer to shave than my older Norelco's and was irritating to my face. So I decided to try the new Spectra version. Good thing I did because they have definetly improved on the slots and holes idea. This razor is sort of a hybrid of the quadraction and the reflex razors. The Norelco Spectra 8890XL is fantastic. It gives a close, irritation free shave as close to a quality blade (Mach 3 razor) as you can get. The nine comfort settings are a great feature. Also nice is the LCD display and you get 70 minutes of shave time off of a 1 hour charge. Although the price may seem high initially when you figure in the cost of razor blades and shaving cream this razor pays for itself in no time. The Spectra 8890XL is the most feature loaded, highest quality electric shaver on the market.

PROS:  Good shave, feels good in the hand and easy to clean.
CONS:  The stand is not nearly as good as my old Norelco 985RX, I have to put it on a little carefully or the shaver topples over.  I don't like the on off switch, it's a button and takes a little too much pressure to use, I prefer the slide on off switch that my old Norelco had.  Compared to my old shaver Norelco, the display is too small and dark a little hard to read, my old Norelco is big, bright and very easy to read, they really went backwards in this part of the design.
NIT PICKING: It feels like the blades should spin faster but since the shave is so good, probably not fair to put this as a con.
CONCLUSION: I love the shave compared to my old Norelco 985RX and that's what matters the most, I would buy it again, but that switch, stand and display make me give this item three stars.
description: Norelco's Spectra Shaving System, 9 Adjustable Settings, for sensitive to normal skin, for unsurpassed comfort and closeness.

The Spectra is Norelco's top-shelf model, and this version is the cream of the Spectra crop. It combines the company's best shaving components with cordless convenience and high-tech features. For the smoothest, most comfortable shave possible, the razor's surface is flexible to the touch with three individually floating heads. Combined, the Lift and Cut heads contain 45 lifters and 45 blades that raise whiskers gently and cut them cleanly. The result is an extra thorough, below-the-surface smoothness.

The shaver includes nine comfort control settings, so that you can adjust spring and pressure, plus a full-width pop-up trimmer for sideburns and moustaches. A luminous LCD shows remaining battery power in minutes and reminds you when to charge and clean the shaver. Charging takes just an hour for 70 minutes of shave time, and a 6-minute quick charge gets you 3 minutes in an emergency. The low-noise motor, comfortable grip, and washable razor head make the grooming experience even more luxurious, while worldwide voltage simplifies travel. The shaver comes with a stand, deluxe case, coil cord, cleaning brush, and protective cap. Norelco backs it with a 60-day satisfaction guarantee and a two-year warranty. --Emily Bedard
title: Norelco 8890XL / 8892XL Spectra Rechargeable Cord/Cordless Men's Shaving System ( 8890 XL / 8892 XL

reviewText:
The Bathtub & Shower Wine Glass Holder is perfect for days you just want to lounge about in the tub and have a relaxing soak without the worry of accidentally bumping your wine glass off the edge of the tub. It's simple, but well designed. The clear plastic makes it discreet enough to leave in there even when you're not currently using it. The suction cups hold best when the surface you're applying them to is freshly cleaned. I used a bit of rubbing alcohol on the tile & the suction cups to ensure a great hold and had no issues with it. It holds both stemmed wine glasses and champagne flutes, if your glassware is stemless than this is not the product for you. It was sturdy even under a, very, full glass of wine and I had no concerns about it falling. This is going to be my new favorite, fun gift idea for girlfriends who also enjoy a long soak and a glass of wine.
I received this product for free in return for my unbiased review.
go trump

My tub has a very small ledge around it. We don't even have space to store shampoo on it let alone a glass when Im trying to unwind. I would always put my glass outside the tub and that is less than convenient because Id have to sit up and reach for it and drip water all over the floor. Yes, first world problems, I know.

I love that this is such a simple item. Just one piece and a couple suction cups. The suction cups are super strong and do not give at all with a wine glass on it. The holder itself does not bend at all with the wind glass on it either. It seems to be very durable as long as you're not trying to use it to get out of the tub haha. Dishwasher safe is major bonus. The only down side is that most of my wine glasses have a thick stem and would not fit so I am limited to the few skinnier stemmed glasses I have. Again, first world problems.

reviewText: Yes! If you are a frequenter of computer screens these definitely help. I was skeptical but these work as a buffer and have definitely saved me from many a eye strain. I don't wear them every single day but it's nice to know that they actually do serve a purpose when I need them.

Great for PC/monitor viewing (short distance). It seems to have a slight magnification, because I see better with them on (when working on a laptop). For me, they didn't work with gaming on a console 9 feet away. I wish the lenses would be larger since I have to move my head to view my laptop (15.4") thru the lenses. I didn't have them protected with a case and the lenses chipped in my junk drawer--again hindsight is 20/20... I still use them.  They seem to take out the blue coloring from the light emanating from LCD's.

These glasses are good for the price. At first I was annoyed that they have some magnification but I've gotten used to it. They help me when I sit at my computer by relieving the glare on my eyes from the screen. (I also like that they make me look professional.)

reviewText: I have used this product for over two years. Since I am not a big fan of most citrus fruit, this has been a great addition to my diet.  It has helped my digestive system as well as giving me a regularity I'd never experienced before. Although regularity is not advertised as a benefit of using OPC-3, it is a wonderful side effect!!

I started using this per the advice from my chiropractor for chronic back pain.  I was seeing a chiropractor daily for several months without relief and at a high cost.  I started using this product in conjunction with fish oil capsules daily.  To my surprise I found relatively quick relief.  I was at the point where I was going to have to get an epidural which is an invasive procedure that I was wary of.  This helped prevent me from having to do that.  The reason it helped is the pycnogenol which is a stong anti-inflammatory agent.  I would recommend this product to anyone who is suffering from chronic pain in conjunction with use of fish oil.  I continue to use this product and have very minimal back pain if any at all.

When used consistantly, I find this product be effective.  I was told it is good for anti-immflamatory purposes.  I noticed that my carpal tunnel does not hurt.  I was wearing a writst band, and have the product has enabled me to work with out it.

reviewText: I just purchased my first nitro-piston air rifle, the Crosman MTR77.  Like many reviewers have claimed, the stock scope was sorely inadequate.  This was proven to me after successfully hitting diddly squat with a dozen shots through the provided scope.  I knew I wanted some iron front and rear sights.  This Sniper front and rear iron sights combo fulfilled my needs!  Installation couldn't have been easier requiring zero tools.  These metal sights appear rugged with its all metal construction, unlike the flip-up polymer model which I returned.  I expect these sights to easily last the life of the rifle.  Thanks to these sights, my air rifle is now a tack driver.  At 32 bucks, it's a reasonable price to pay for match grade iron sights.

The front sight was ok, but the rear sight wouldn't mount firmly to my Rail. No matter how much I tightened it, the sight was still very loose and wobbly. As such it was basically unusable.

Update: I was able to use a thicker peice or rail clamp to mount the rear sight to my rifle. Now I love these sights, they're great! It's just too bad that I had to tinker with that rear sight.
purchased as a gift for a gun loving friend  he loves them
description: TACBRO
title: SNPIER®Model 4/15 Match-grade Detachable Rear Front Sight Set for Designed to Use with Handguard Rails or High Profile Gas Block

reviewText:
I was sent a sample of this gel with a request to fully test it and evaluate it, and I am happy to report that it is, simply put, the best skin exfoliator I have tried so far.  I am a big believer in freshening up my skin with peeling products, both of the physical and chemical variety.  Over the years I have tried many different types and they all contain some sort of rough, gritty substance to mechanically rub off the top layer of the skin.  One of my peeling products has sharp fragments of pulverized apricot shells, another crushed salt, and my latest relies on sugar particles.

I have never seen anything like this gel.  It is completely smooth and yet, after a few minutes of massage, chunks of dead skin ball up and come away. I find that rinsing with water is not enough to remove all the residual cell debris, so I use a facecloth or a sponge.  My face emerges refreshed and smoother than I thought possible with pores visibly tightened.  My sensitive skin loves this product and I have never had any undesirable side effects.  It's the sort of thing I can use before a night out, followed by makeup, or simply to prepare my skin for serum and moisturizer at night.

The modern, sleek container is really high-end and beautiful to have sitting on my bathroom shelf and, at the rate it's going, the 50 ml (1.69 oz) contents should last at least a month with regular twice-weekly use.

I always look at the ingredients before putting anything on my skin, and the list here is full of most reassuringly natural extracts:  camellia leaves, sea salt, aloe vera, argan oil, orange peel, papaya, pomegranate, cucumber and Dunaliella (a micro-algae found in sea fields).  As with other Simon & Tom formulations, there is an equally long list of artificial and toxic ingredients that are NOT included.  It only took me a couple of uses to recognize this gel as the best peeling product I have used to date.  The fresh aroma and smooth texture make this a joy to use and, after rinsing, I don't feel as though I have rubbed away my fingerprints.
I like this peeling gel more than others I used. Nice smell , works very fast and the skin feels great.
Ihave recommended this to family and friends. My skin feels silky smooth after using, and only a small amount is needed
description: A unique blend of soft mechanical exfoliation and enzyme peeling. Simon & Tom Soft Peeling Gel gently eliminates impurities and dead skin cells to reveal a brighter and more even complexion.

Papaya enzymes deeply exfoliate the skin and stimulate cell renewal. The Cucumber enriched formula helps remove excess oil, tighten pores and reduce imperfections while leaving the skin soft and hydrated. Upon the first application, skin looks noticeably smoother, refined, and more radiant.

Our aim atSimon & Tomis to provideall women worldwidewithnatural, safe, efficientcosmetics. We blendArgan Oilof the highest qualitysourced from our own fieldsin Moroccowith the most scientifically advancedactive botanical ingredientsin order to offer you unique sensorial beauty rituals at a fair price. Our products are free of Parabens and Phthalates free and are not tested on animals.
For best results use with Simon & Tom PURE HYDRA Hydrating Firming Day Cream with SPF and Simon & Tom PURE HYDRA Multi Active Recovery Night Cream
title: Simon & Tom Soft Peeling Gel, Moroccan Argan Oil Based Facial Cleanser for All Skin Types. 1.69oz

reviewText:
This is a review for all three of the moisturizers.

Green Tea - This mask is for people who deal with excess sebum. That being said, I use this one the most. Not only does my skin feel hydrated instead of greasy in the morning, but after the third use I noticed less breakouts around my chin and jawline (I have hormonal acne and horribly sensitive skin).
Black Tea : This mask improves elasticity of the skin. I haven't used this long enough to notice a huge difference, but my skin does feel plump when I wake up, and my mom has had the same result!
Strawberry - Like most strawberry skin care products, this one is for people who deal with dry skin. I won't need to use this until the cold seasons arrive, but my mom needs heavy moisturizing products year-round. Her skin has definitely been looking more hydrated and brighter!

Instructions and ingredients are provided on the boxes, both in Korean and English.

I only have two small complaints about the products:
1. There's a very noticeable amount of fragrance. They all smell great, but it's a bit strong. Thankfully, the smell does fade after the moisturizer is massaged into the skin. My face normally can't tolerate products with so much fragrance, but so far all has gone well.
2. The packaging. Yes, it is adorable, but I'd prefer the spoon be able to stay in the cup. You use the spoon to scoop out the tapioca pearls and smash them up in your palm. It's a long spoon, and it pulls out a lot of moisturizer with it. With this product a little goes a long way (which makes it a total steal at it's current price), so I scrape off a lot of excess.

Like I said, those are small complaints, so this product is very much worth trying out. So long as Etude House keeps making it I'll keep buying it.

I love this stuff. I put it on before bed and wake up to plump skin! One of my favorite night time moisturizers. Definitely will repurchase! One container has lasted me about 8 months with fairly regular use.

The package is beyond kawaii!!!! I love it so much, theres a hook for your spoon or a spoon little holder from the lid-very convenient. I haven't use it yet, hope it works on me.. the scent is light & comfy. I don't see much boba compares to the strawberry one but its okie. Overall, im very satisfied

I did get a discount for reviewing.

The whole palette is my daily eye makeup shades so it's perfect to bring with me everyday and do my makeup! And it's fits into my little makeup bag perfectly so that's a plus

reviewText: This product is more a 4.5 but I didn't want to down play it by rating it a 4. The product came quickly and in good shape the price was great, the only real downside is the more dramatic night time lashes are not dramatic they work better as day lashes. With that in mind the day lashes basically have very little effect. Both can be worn easily if you know how to apply false lashes, I would like to see the night lashes in a pack with some more dramatic lashes so I can actually wear for day and night not just day time. I know from the picture the night lashes look bold but when applied with your make up they do not. I wear nude light colors during the day and they look great, if I do a darker look they become very understated and almost disappear. That being said I would definitely recommend and for the price at the time like 3$ I would buy again just for what they consider night time lashes.

I use lashes all the time and was drawn in by the price for so many lashed in two different styles. However, the bands are thick and stiff. Definitely costume or special occasion lashes, not for casual wear.
If you're willing to shape and trim your own lashes for daily wear, look for the bundles of 10 pair handmade lashes. They come from overseas, so the shipping takes awhile, but the bands are thin and extremely flexible. They disappear into the lash line like the should with little to no liner for camouflage.
I like it
title: BMC 20 Pair 2 Styles False Eyelashes - Day To Night Falsies Collection, Set 6

reviewText:
These nail files are really easy to use and they are sturdy. It seems like it's rougher on one side than the other. They are also really easy to clean and able to be disinfected. I think these are a great value for the price you pay. It takes me maybe half the time to file my nails with these than my previous drugstore files. These would last a lot longer than my previous files. I was really surprised by the quality and strength of these files. Love them! I would most definitely recommend these to other people!

Disclaimer: I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my unbiased review. I am not affected by this discount at all and I strive to provide my absolute honest opinion as if I purchased the product for full retail price. I always appreciate the honest reviews from other users, so I also want to provide my honest thoughts on the products I purchase and use.

Pros
- This pink nail file has what I would consider a medium grit on one side and a slightly rougher grit on the other side (600/300).
- It has foam in the middle, feels sturdy, and does a great job on my natural or gel-polished nails, but would also work on false
  nails or tips.  (I use a stronger grit with a lower number for acrylic nails.)
-  The grit is lasting much longer than my last file.
- Instructions are printed on this file that it is washable and disinfectable.

Cons
- None.

I would purchase this product again.

I often depend on others leaving honest reviews when I need to order a new item.  I find that one of the most difficult things about ordering online is that I cant hold or touch the products before buying them.  So, I love reviews from others who have touched, inspected, and used the item Im thinking about purchasing.  I strive for the same in leaving reviews for others  to leave a review that will help others make an informed decision (never to inflate the product's quality). I received this item at a discount or gratis from the manufacturer or a seller to objectively test and review it, but received no payment and have no obligation to offer anything other than my real opinion based on my experience.  Amazon's "Verified Purchase" indicator shows that this review matches an actual product ordered and delivered from Amazon. If you have found this review helpful, Id love if youd indicate that below.  Also, feel free to ask any other questions about the product that I haven't answered.

I never thought I would be saying this, but I love these files. I have been a bit frustrated with the files you can get at the stores around me. Most of them are barely usable after one use. I wasn't expecting much when I ordered these but figured I would give them a shot. Much to my surprise they are one of the best files I've ever used. They look just the picture posted. I used one to file my nails down and you can't even tell I used it, the grit feels the same as when I took it out of the package. I can see getting many uses out of one, so I picture the three lasting for long time. It does say on the file that they are 100% washable and disinfectable, I have never washed a file before and if your getting these for home use I don't know that it would be necessary, but it you have a business or job where you do nails then that is an added bonus. I'm very pleased and would recommend these to anyone.
I did receive this product for free/at a reduced cost for my free and honest review. The discount I received in no way influenced my opinion on this product.

reviewText: I bought this from another seller but am happy that it is available on Amazon. The first couple of weeks I noticed no improvement. I began using a little more (about the size of an unpopped popcorn kernel for both eyes), allowing it to dry before putting on makeup, and the change was amazing. All of the fine lines and wrinkles around my eyes are gone! I've started to use it on a vertical line on my forehead (for which Botox was not doing much) and it has started to fade as well.

I liked the Rapid Eye Serum because it works. It feels soothing on the tissue around the eyes and I have also used it in the area above my upper lip. This is my second bottle and I am very happy with it.

This product is a complete waste of money. I've been using this for some time and haven't seen a difference as of yet, the product says you'll see a difference in two weeks but it's been a little over a month and my eyes still look the same.(dark circles and all) No difference in this product. Save your money!!
description: Rapid Repair Eye Serum works at the cellular level, by eliminating the blood originating pigments responsible for the dark circles and local inflammation around the eye area, making it superior to all other products. Through this process, Rapid Repair is able to, not only eliminate, but also prevent puffiness and bags under the eyes, boost epidermal regeneration and lessen the appearance of dark circles and fine lines.
title: Rapid Repair Eye Serum w/ Regu-Age & Vitamin C (Ester) - 15 ml / .5 oz

reviewText: I purchased this because I was looking for a natural mascara. Unfortunately I was not happy with it. Just in couple hours after applying - it would start flaking. It also smudges easily.

I have a problem with mascara leaving a black ring under my eyes, flaking and just coming off throughout the day. I started using tubing mascara because I just couldn't find any that worked. I decided to try this because I'm switching to organic makeup and this had a ton of good reviews. I am totally impressed! Its 100 degrees outside, 95% humidity and I have to be outside for work. This mascara does not budge! It thickens my lashes way more than I'm used to with tubing mascara (it reminds me of my other favorite brand "Two Faced better-than-sex" mascara.) But without all the harsh chemicals! Tips I have is to wear an eyeshadow primer and a light dusting of finishing powder (I use W3ll People's translucent setting powder... love that stuff!) before applying the mascara. Wipe the excess after you pull it from the tube and curl your lashes before applying. This stuff is amazing! I take naps with it on, even take a quick body shower and it looks fresh all day. I remove it with a homemade makeup remover made from organic jojoba oil, coconut oil and alovera gel and it comes right off. I will definitely be buying this again!! I just wish Amazon sold it for $20 like other online stores do.
Love this mascara its my go to for natural ingredients and thickens like not other
title: Black Natural Macara

reviewText:
I finally found a product to give me that slight "bend" that I needed to make me look like Jennifer Aniston (I wish!). I recently cut my, somewhat long, baby fine and thinning hair into that style known as "The Rachel". The one that Jennifer Aniston made so popular. It is long all over, but graduated lengths in the front. This style needs a large round brush to acheive that slight bend at the ends.

I am terrible with a round brush and blow dryer. I tried a blow dryer with a round brush attachment and found it extremely cumbersome. Finally, I came upon the Helen of Troy "Mega" heated brush and..... voila!....perfection!

I dry my hair with a regular blow dryer and after it is dry, I use the "Mega" brush to give me the "bend". I can also use it on days when I have not washed my hair, as well.

I am very pleased with this product.

I love this curling brush.  It gives so much body and fullness to my straight hair.  Some curling brushes are too small and makes my hair unruly with tight, little curls.  The 1 inch diameter gives soft curls.  I also purchased the 1 1/2 inch diameter and love it even more!  I have to buy it online as I can't find it at any stores in my area.

I had this same curling iron before, but dropped it so many times that it cracked causing me to buy a new one.  The new curling iron is just as great as my old one, and I love a brush curling iron because it gives a softer curve and is also a bit harder to burn yourself on.  However, I've still managed to burn myself!  The one thing I do not like about this new curling iron is that there is this really tiny groove that runs around the bottom of the barrel between the hot barrel and the handle.  My hair gets caught in this grove all the time, and it either ends up getting pulled out or crimped really funny.  I think as the curling iron gets older and is used more perhaps this groove won't longer be an issue.  Overall, I still like the curling iron and I use it almost everyday.
description: Helen of Troy 1514 Brush Iron, White, 1 1/2 Inches Barrel
title: Helen of Troy 1514 Brush Iron, White, 1 1/2 Inches Barrel

reviewText: it was difficult to use in the beginning but got the hang of it and love them

Took me several tries to get it right.  Kinda difficult with long curly hair.  But once I managed to get the bun in my hair, I got lots of compliments on it at work.  Every one thought I was that talented to do a bun like that myself.  Ha!  I wish.

I purchased these Hot Buns to share with my daughter. I was excited that the Hot Buns were much cheaper than they are in stores, but I worried that it wouldn't be the same "As Seen on TV" product. They arrived on time in the same packaging as pictured and as seen on TV. I recommend practicing with the Hot Bun maker several times before wearing it out because it took me a little while to get the hang of it. After I mastered the technique, I've worn it several times and received many compliments on it every time! It looks awesome when it's in my hair correctly. I've had to use an extra rubberband around it to spread out my hair more evenly. It doesn't hurt when I take it out as some other reviewers mentioned. I have long and fine blonde hair and the small Hot Bun maker is perfect. It helps to create a look that is beautiful, poised, and professional. This is definitely one of my favorite Amazon purchases.
description: Create trendy bun hairstyles like your favorite celebrities wear! Simply roll, snap & wrap hair into a bun to wear in a variety of styles--high on top of the head, low on the neck, or even a pretty side bun. The central cord secures the bun and keeps it in place without pins. Lightweight and comfortable; great for all ages. Set of 2 light color - one small, one large.
