reviewText: I found these to be well made.  I have fine, straight hair, and I used snoods back in the late 80s, when I was still working. After trying various other hairstyles over the years, I'm growing my hair out again, because it's easier.  These are a pretty, easy way to keep hair up and contained--you can tuck your hair into the net, and I like the new twist of the lace overlay on the net itself. These are working for me even now, where my hair isn't fully grown out enough to put it up any other way without looking undone.  The bow, the overlay and the snood are well attached to each other and to the barrette, which also seems fairly strong. (And if it will hold my hair, it will hold anything).  I did look at other brands, where you can separate the pieces, but that seems a recipe for disaster, as I found with some snoods I had back in the day.  I would love to see other colors in the snoods that don't feature the lace cover, but as a sort of snood- connoisseur, I found these to be well made, well packed, and worth the price.

I wore one of the Lace Bow Bow knot at my son's wedding. I have long hair and it was nice to just push it into the net that is attached to the bow. I wore another one at a friends wedding. I just use these bows for when I have an event to go to so I'm not sure how much they will hold up but I don't think they are for everyday use. They are really pretty and they make your hair look dressed up with out having to do much to get it that way! Would buy again!!

reviewText:
I'm not sure what to say about these things.  I like to review everything I buy because I feel like people need to know what they're getting themselves into, but I mean, these extensions are a puzzle to me.  So here's the good:  They're very pretty, soft, and easy to dye (darker) in order to match to your natural color.  You can use light heat to make them pretty.  I'm a fan of all that.

The bad: I tried to put these things in my very short hair, by myself, at 2am.  It was a hair massacre of epic proportions.  I messed up so badly. I don't blame the hair extensions for my own stupidity though.  I mean, it's not their fault I'm a moron.  It is their fault, however, that the tape sucks.  A lot.  and that you're basically going to have to cut the bottom two inches off the extensions in order to not look like an 80's beach bunny.  They're kind of gross, man.

The end result: I pulled them out (along with a lot of my own hair).  I decided to go with clip ins until my hair was longer.  I did keep the extensions and will get better tape for them. Now that the bottoms are trimmed, they're actually very pretty, so it would be a waste not to keep them.  I'll use them once I have someone to help me put them in and NOT butcher my hair.

I love love love these! While they are not super thick ...they are perfect my needs.  I change my hair color every few months.. I keep my hair length just below my shoulders use just one set to fill but two sets for a fuller look. I have dyed them ..myself...to match my color. Now I can just switch out sets when I get bored or want an ombr look.  They are not heavy..which is perfect because I have fine hair and these blend beautifully with my hair texture. If you have never used tape in extentions before.. I highly recommend these as a starter set..so you can get the feel for wearing these. For the price..it's an excellent value and surprisingly beautiful shinyhair....so if you don't like it..at least you haven't spent hundreds on something you won't use.  Also..they curl beautifully!!

Although these were much better than the expensive ones I bought the tape still did not hold up through the first shower iPhone load every instruction including sulfate free shampoo you and waiting to wash my hair the tape still did not hold although we did hold much better than the hundred dollar ones that I bought prior to this. I purchased some tape separate Lee and I'm going to try something different I will post a separate review and I'm going to use these extensions with that separate tape and I will let you all know how it works the hair again is of great quality I will say that . Especially this brand the ends are still thin but not near as bad as some of the others.
title: Fabwigs Tape In Human Hair Extensions - 16 Inch/30 Grams 20pcs #613 Bleach Blonde - Silky Straight Skin Weft Human Remy Hair

reviewText: I must say this is the best shaver that I've had, shaves pretty much like a blade shave only less irritation. I had a Quadra before and upgraded myself to this shaver. It's been about 3 weeks since I've used the 9160xl and it's been good so far. I did have a couple of weeks adjustment phase even though I was using my Quadra (maybe the technique I use). It was irritating in the cheeks area initially but now have got adjusted, it's cool. The major improvement is in the jaw and neck region, not at all irritating and the sensitive modes do help. I think the Smarttouch is a plus than the SpeedXL models (again that is at a personal level), I feel it's easier on the wrist.

I've been a Norelco user for several years now. I have a thick beard, and am always looking for an electric razor that can give me the convenience and close shave. When you figure that a Gillette razor with all those blades you have to keep replacing, an electric razor can actually save you money from the conventional shave. My first Norelco was a Reflex that I inherited from my grandfather. It was pretty old, so its rechargable batteries died. The Quadra series came out, so I tried switching to that. I found it did give me a closer shave because the heads were flexible and could better fit the contours of my face. It worked fine, and then the Spectra came out. The differences between the Quadra and the Spectra are not great. The main thing is that the Spectra has a sensitivity dial (with my beard, I always have to have it set to the highest setting....which is pretty much like the Quadra). It supposedly has different heads....the blades are exactly like the Quadra and the slots are slightly different. Basically, there isn't a big difference between the two with shaving. I did find that one benifit of the Spectra was that you can use it as a corded razor while it's recharging (the Quadra and Reflex only run on batteries....so when the battery dies, you pretty much have to chuck the razor).  I can honestly say Norelco has seriously upgraded with the smart touch system. Each head has twice as many blades....with 3 rows instead of one. The heads also sit on a cradle that rocks back and forth. So it can reach any pesky curve or crevice on your face. It's certainly worth plunking down the money if you have a heavy beard and are looking for a close shave from an electric razor.

Got mine about a month ago...

Positives:  I'm still on my first charge, so battery is good so far.  Shaves slightly better than my older Norelco.

Negatives:  The rubbery surface does not feel as comfortable as my old one in my hand.  Hair stubs get stuck on the rubber surface, and are harder to clean off. The entire blade assembly comes apart from rest of shaver - be careful when you first clean it, as I didn't expect it and dropped it.  I don't know why, but I often get a handful of hair stubs when I shave.  That's kind of annoying.

Considering that you can get an older model for half the price, I would say save the money and get a cheaper model.

description: If one child gets lice, your whole family is at risk. That's why Lice Shield protects your whole family. Its gentle blend of natural essential oils is proven to repel lice in laboratory tests. For hours of defense and peace of mind, protect your family with Lice Shield.

The Lice Shield Ultra Protection Kit contains 3 layers of protection, and is ideal for a family to use following a lice outbreak, or during peak lice periods. The kit contains Lice Shield Shampoo & Conditioner in 1, Lice Shield Leave in Spray, and Lice Shield Long Lasting Spot Stick.

Shampoo & Conditioner in 1:

CAUTION: If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. FIRST AID: If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly with clean water.

Leave In Spray:

CAUTION: For external use only. Avoid inhaling. Avoid contact with eyes. FIRST AID: If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly with clean water.

Long Lasting Spot Stick:

CAUTION: Avoid excessive application to skin. FIRST AID: If skin irritation occurs, discontinue use and wash with warm water and soap.

Intended for use as a deterrent, and does not kill lice or eggs, or treat an infestation.

Shampoo & Conditioner in 1: Apply generously to wet hair, lather well and rinse out. Repeat as desired.

Leave In Spray: Spray liberally onto washed, towel dried hair. Leave on hair and let dry gently. Also suitable for use on dry hair, and directly on hats, scarves, and helmets. For best results, use daily after Lice Shield Shampoo & Conditioner in 1.

Long Lasting Spot Stick: Twist up 1/4 to 1/2 inch of product. Gently apply to dry hair, focusing on the areas along the neckline and above the ears for short hairstyles, and on the ends of hair and ponytails in longer styles.

reviewText: The compartments don't stay closed.

This medicine box is ok for what it is, but unfortunately it's described inaccurately.  It says you can "pop out one day's medicine" and take it with you.  That is not true.  There is no way to pop out one day of medicine from this box.  The entire item is three pieces: one piece is the actual medicine compartments, and the other two pieces are the lids.

As it is, it's not what I was expecting, but it will do the job of holding a week of meds separated into day/night doses, or two weeks of meds if you keep each day's meds in one compartment.  Also, the wells are nice and large and the front edges are curved so you can easily scoop out the pills.

This is a nice product for keeping track of your medications.  It has a compartment for each day of the week with both an AM and PM slot.  This makes it really convenient to keep track of if medication has been taken that day or not, as well as if there is something that has to be taken at night rather than in the morning.  My wife likes to take many supplements and vitamins and such as well as her normal prescriptions, and this product allows her to keep better track of if she has taken her morning or night pills.  Each compartment is capable of holding several pills of varied sizes.  Her only comment is that she wishes that the two colors were more separated ( this one is clear purple and clear blue).  She said it would be better with red and blue or something more distinguishing but since it also has AM and PM labels printed on each compartment that this is not really a problem.  I have noticed that the compartments are easily opened.  This could be both a good and bad thing.  If you were to drop this pill box full of pills, they would likely go everywhere.  But if you have a hard time opening pill bottles, this would be more convenient.  I would just say that it will work well on a counter, but probably should not be used while traveling.

Disclosure: I have received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review, but that fact has not influenced my opinion about the product. I was not required to write a positive review and no monetary compensation was received for writing reviews.
title: Wumal Portable 14-Slot Medicine Pill Ezy Dose Storage Box Case Organizer

I have found it increasingly difficult to find round brushes like this one. Most round brushes either have boar's hair/synthetic boar's hair, or, if they have nylon bristles, the bristles are often very thin, and there are a lot of them. The boar's hair/small, clustered bristles tend to get stuck in my hair. This is the only brush I have found as of late that has nylon (plastic-like) bristles that aren't too small or clustered together. I have long, thick, slightly wavy hair that takes about 20 minutes to dry thoroughly with a hairdryer. I have found that this brush cuts my dry time by a few minutes, which is meaningful to me since I hate drying my hair.

My only complaint is that I wish it had more vents so that air could travel freely through the brush. Also, the pattern pictured here is not the pattern I received. The picture here is showing a purple/red snakeskin pattern. Mine was a red/yellow/blue fluorescent tree pattern. I actually like the pattern I received better than the one pictured, but I wouldn't buy this brush expecting to get the pictured pattern.

reviewText: I first bought this toothpaste a few years ago when it was manufactured by TriMedica.  It was wonderful stuff, made your mouth feel amazingly clean.  Then they sold the company to Zand.  I bought two tubes of the new version.  They were like tubes filled with leather.  No way to soften them up, no way to squeeze anything out.  I sent them back.  I called the company later to ask if they had fixed the problem.  They gave me some story about how "at the end of a run" it tended to be thicker and they were going to change the formula, blah blah.  My question is, why did they change it in the first place from the excellent product it used to be?  So now I buy Tea Tree Therapy Baking Soda toothpaste.  It's quite good, and reasonably priced too, but not the really superior product SilvaFresh used to be.  If Zand had continued to make the original TriMedica product, instead of "improving" it, I'd still be buying it.
I was unable to squeeze any toothpaste from the tubes, a complete wast of money.

I was a serious fan of the Trimedica Silva Fresh toothpaste that was discontinued a while back, and wondered if the new version would stand up to the previous. Although the active ingredients seem very similar, it's not quite as wonderful as the original, but might appeal more to more traditional toothpaste users. There's more of a peppermint flavor, and less of the slightly "oily" feeling that the previous version left in your mouth right after brushing (probably something most people couldn't get used to and a reason to change the recipe, although it was ok once you got used to it). This Zand formula still does a pretty good job of addressing oral health issues  - it seems to leave your mouth feeling clean and fresh. The original version really changed my oral health for the better, and this one is close. If you suffer from bacterial problems (gingivitis, bad breath, etc.), it's worth a try.
title: Zand Silva Fresh Toothpaste 3 Oz

reviewText:
Many dramatic reviews warned me not to use this product or my nails would be permanently ruined.  I assumed the people who wrote those reviews were over-reacting, probably not using the product correctly, or have bad nails to start with.  Every day now, as I look at my badly damaged nails, I'm so sorry I didn't believe the reviews.

The Kiss nails are beautiful, can be filed down to the preferred size and shape (yes, even if pre-colored) and the pre-colored nails never chipped or faded and always looked like they had just been applied.  They came in a comfortable length too.  I was ready to make this my new habit.

While wearing the nails, I noticed my nail beds were painful for the first day or two.  I assume this is from the pressure of an artificial nail pulling the natural nail into a shape that wasn't the same as it was attached to my finger.  It stopped hurting after 2 days.

The first week, three of the nails fell off.  The second week, 5 of the nails fell off.  I used the glue (not the stickers) and did everything as instructed so it was frustrating to have this happen.

I only applied two nail sets, for 5-6 consecutive days each time with a 4-day rest between.  When I took  off the second set, it was obvious I could never wear them again.  After wearing my second set for 6 days, I was stunned to find three nails that had partially turned green (pseudomonas).  I knew immediately that the reviews were right and I could never wear the nails again.  The green faded somewhat after a week, using alcohol on the nails daily to cure the infection.

Two months have passed since that time, and my natural nails have continued to split and crumble.  Now there is no white area left of my nails, and they continue to crumble.  I can't trim a snagging nail because all that is left is attached to the nail bed.  One nail with green still visible will stay that color until that section of the nail grows out.

Listen to the reviews  don't destroy your nails with this product, or you'll have the same kind of regrets that I do.

So the trick to any press on nail set, is to file the nails to size of each nail. I file the sides to go parallel perfectly with my nail shape, and then with these, I cut the corners and file down to make a more oval shape. I'm not a big fan of square nails at the moment and I need my nails short for playing keyboards rn so I don't mind that I lose some length.

I also do NOT use the "adhesive" stickers the nails come with. The are gummy and have found come off easier than just using the glue straight to nail. Also I have less nail damage when popping them off.

They last 2-3 weeks easily.. just expect a few to pop off here and there, but I always carry the little glue stick around w me just in case and don't mind having to put one or two back on. After a few weeks, removal is very easy. The glue usually gets old and you can pick them off easily without acitone or any removers. And I have found these nails are A MILLION times less damaging to my natural nails compared to gels or acrylics done at a salon. Plus a million times less expensive too!

Only takes me about 30 mins to size up my nails (I now actually know my size numbers for each finger for this brand which makes it very easy), file them to size and glue them on.

BIG TIPS IN LONG LASTING WEAR!!!
1) never pick a nail size that's too small for ur nail.. it WILL pop off. Make sure when choosing a size, the whole service sits on the surface of your nail easily without pushing down

2) prime your nails by filing/cutting down, and wiping nails with rubbing alcohol to remove and dirt or oil from your skin that will loosen the bond between your nail and the glue quicker.

3) do NOT over-glue. Thinly coat the glue directly on the nail, and apply nail on top. Then, make sure you have a clean finger that didn't get any glue on it or it will smudge on top of ur pretty new nail, and press and hold down nail while glue adhears for 30-60 seconds, applying pressure to the whole serface of the nail.

And you'll be lookin cuteeeee! These r the best nail solutions I've come across. Press on nails in general have changed my life.

So the last pic u see, the nail cracked a bit. These nails are a bit more thin and natural which is nice.. I like that delicate look, but I'm always very hard on my nails, so just be careful when cleaning or working! I hit mind on the wall when going to turn off a light! Haha I know lol
Much too large for my fingernail bases
title: Kiss Nails GEL FANTASY "KGN12" (RIBBONS) Short Design Nails w/Adhesive Tabs & Glue

reviewText: I had an electric razor years ago by Norelco that I really liked, but when it quit working I just kept using the electric hair clippers followed by razor blades. When the hair clippers quit I knew it was time to get a new one. The results have been fantastic. This electric groomer gets closer than the hair clippers did and with the other attachments it gets better results than my first Norelco. I use the product for shaving my face and head before I use blades and it's made it a lot easier. Being able to use it without keeping it plugged in all the time is also a big plus. Seeing that I shave my head too I haven't used the hair clipper attachment on myself, but got fair results when using it on my nephews who have pretty thick hair. I'm able to use the groomer 3-4 times before I have to recharge it. My opinion, you can't go wrong with this product for this price so why pay more for other similar products.

...turns out, i didn't.  this compact and versatile product does everything it promises and does it well.  i can't attest to how it compares to similar, more expensive products, but i don't need to: there are plenty of attachments, the battery life is good, and it carries out all the grooming tasks flawlessly.  can't beat the value!

I bought this last December, so Ive been using it for 8 months now.  I don't grow a beard, so I've been using it to cut my hair instead.  It saved me money from going to the barber because I like my hair short, since my hair is thin it doesn't look right when it's long, so I cut short very often with these trimmers. It works out good.  The only problems are that:

you cannot use it when plugged in,

it may run out of power on you,

you must remove trimmings from comb often due to its "cupped" design

you must be very careful about the blue plastic head because it is very flimsy and it will break if you drop it.

I recommend removing and storing the plastic head somewhere.  I just broke mine, and I need to get warranty service for it.  I guess overall, it saved me time and money.  Instead of going to the barber for an hour and spending money every 4 weeks, I bought this cheap trimmer and cut my hair myself in 30 minutes.

It's not the best, but it's cost efficient for me.
description: Norelco's Multi-Trim offers all the tools needed to trim beard and moustache, hair on your head, nose, ears, eyebrows, neckline and sideburns.
title: Philips Norelco G270 Multi-Trim All Purpose Groomer

reviewText: first time i use shampoo bar.  I love it  smells great and leaves your hair clean clean and very shinny  great product

I have shampooed my hair about once every 2-3 months for over 10 years. I hate that "squeeky-clean" sound, and the tangling of my thick curly hair. This bar gets my (and my thicker haired daughter's) scalp and hair clean without drying it out. I even used it on my Virgin Indian Remy weave hair, and it didn't require conditioning, afterward.

The first time I used this shampoo bar, I really didn't like the way it made my hair feel, tangled and kind of greasy.  But I had heard your hair or scalp has to adjust to shampoo bars so I kept using it.  After a few days I have really come to love how soft and manageable my hair has become. It also leaves your body nice and moisturized and so smooth too!  I also use the Tasmania conditioner bar just on the ends of my hair and it compliments this bar very nicely.  No tangles, soft and bouncy hair!  I am a blonde, which has been damaged by highlighting my more brassy dirty blonde natural hair color and it was really in bad condition.  Most shampoos will further dry out my hair, this bar doesn't at all and it does have a pleasant clean scent, nothing overpowering just a hint of a fruity or citrus scent.  It looks like I barely used it so it will last a long time, just be sure to keep it out of the shower when not using it or it may melt (especially the conditioning bar).  Overall I love both products and would order again.  Still waiting on my Lush order to see if they are worth the heftier price tag.  Would recommend for damaged and dry partially wavy hair for a luxurious soft, bouncy and manageable mane!
description: The smooth and silky Moroccan Mud Shampoo Bar is made from natural Ghassoul clay and contains a rich spicy orange and coriander oil scent. This eco-friendly all natural shampoo bar is not only perfect for regular daily use but also for those suffering with a dry scalp or with unruly and frizzy hair. The shampoo bar delivers an enriched and enhanced natural color and feel to hair of all types and colors. Don't use our Shampoo Bars just once or twice - Give them a chance! Most people report positive results after just 1-2 washings. However, at least 3-4 washings are needed to remove previous products from the hair. If you using synthetic hair styling products such as gel or wax, it's important to use an Apple Cider Vinegar Rinse for best results. Use 3 tablespoons of Apple Cider Vinegar in a quart of water and rinse your hair after shampooing and conditioning to remove the chemical build up in your hair. This process will restore the PH balances to your scalp for super healthy hair.

Try our Apple Silk Clarifying Hair Rinse - an alternative to our best selling Apple Cider Conditioning Rinse, to remove the silicone plasticizers in commercial conditioners and the last residues of shampoo soap. Travel Friendly! Restores hair to healthy condition, relieves dandruff, helps hair grow strong, and perfect for transitioning to a shampoo bar. It brightens and softens, to leave hair cuticles roughened by washing, flat and smooth for maximum shine potential.

reviewText: Excellent product and it works beautifully. Having vitiligo on my lips, I use a concealer, my favorite shade of lipstick and the sealer and my lipstick stays on perfectly until i wipe or wash it off.
Good product and fast delivery

This worked completely fine! One tip that I think the people who voted it down missed out on is that you should NEVER put it on only one lip and rub it together between both, like with lip gloss. I did this the first time I tried it and it failed awfully, but I tried it again and applied it on both lips separately, left my mouth open for 60 seconds (it's harder than it sounds, but it's worth it) and it worked perfectly! I'd missed the edges and inner parts of my lipstick coverage, so be sure to cover all of your lipstick. It comes off fairly easily with water and a paper towel, I'm sure with makeup remover it would come off almost immediately. Definitely worth it!
title: Mehron Makeup Lipstick Sealer (.5 oz)

reviewText: This serum is much easier to apply to my eyelashes than the other one I had previously purchased. It doesn't clump up and it drys rather quickly. I put it on at night right after I wash my face. I am so excited to see the end results of having amazingly beautiful long eyelashes. I will give another review in two weeks and again for the final results in six weeks. I also received an amazing discount for purchasing this item. Thank you.

I've heard of eyelash growth serums. This is my first time trying them.
This particular serum is pretty watery. You apply it more or less the same way you'd apply liquid eyeliner. It absorbs in about 20 minutes.
I've been using this once a day for roughly 2 weeks, and stopped using mascara so I can actually see if it does anything.
Result: My eyelashes are softer, but I'm not entirely certain if I have longer or fuller lashes. I don't seem to notice too much of a difference. I'm guessing I have to use this a bit longer to see any kind of result.
The serum bottle is still mostly full, so I'll keep using it to see if there is any difference. I didn't have any negative reactions, and it was interesting to try something new.
I did receive this product for free or at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
When I received this complimentary product I was super excited to try it. I have been using it as directed and I can really see a difference. I will definitely buy again.
description: Skinology Cosmeceuticals Eyelash Growth Serum, 3.5 ml
title: Skinology Cosmeceuticals Eyelash Growth Serum, 3.5 ml

reviewText: I have heard so many great things about the shima oil and i went on to purchased it. Omg i am so glad i did because my hair used to be so dry, but now when i used the shima oil it became so soft and shiny. And also what makes shima oil so good is that it's not oily compared to the others...My bottle finish so quick in few weeks because i had brought the smallest size which is the 4 oz. Seeing how well my hair reacts to the oild i decided to buy the 8oz and now i am using it before going to bed. I takes lots of note when shima said that protective hairstyles helps with the oil to have long healthy hair. Ladies, She is not lying about it. I have seing so many growth and i am so happy with her oils, the creme, dvd's and so forth. Thank you Shima.

The oil makes the hair so soft.  I like to apply it on wet hair and dry hair.  It's also very good for natural and relaxed hair. I've been using the Shima Oil for a while now and I always get the same results.

I have been following Shima for 2 years on YouTube. When I started viewing her show, I was very depressed because my hair grew very long and then in one salon visit, an enormous amount of hair broke off. I stayed in bed for 2 weeks and cried almost every day. At that moment, I decided to go on a mission to TAKE CARE OF MY OWN HAIR AND NOT GO TO SALONS. I was obsessed. I watched every YouTube video I could find on hair care and hair growth. When I found Shima's channel, I felt like I found nirvana. She is more knowledgeable than most hair stylists ( I know because I have been on this earth a long time and have traveled extensively,and have SEEN IT ALL. Hence, my name on YouTube...earth2air2water). I listen to her advice and follow her instructions and now my hair is the longest it has ever been in my life. I cannot believe how long and healthy it is.
Everyone around me thinks my hair is a weave or a wig ! I have to dig into my hair to show them my scalp.
Shima is kind and genuine, and I trust what she says. The proof is in the pudding. She is the real deal ! She has the beautiful hair to back up her products. I cannot wait to purchase her oil.
description: Shima Oil is a professional formula that is light weight in afterfeel and scent. Only a light application is needed to wipe out hair dryness. reviewText:
I am a college student with a very inconsistent and haphazard sleep schedule. My sleep schedule has caused me to get some serious under eye dark circles. I was worried about how it was affecting my appearance. Even with piling on concealer in the morning, I still feel like my severe dark circles are visible. I was so excited to try out this eye gel in hopes that it could help me!

I have always had dark circles, and after using this eye cream for a few days, they have been going away! My dark circles have been much worse this past year, so I was worried that I wouldn't be able to find a product effective enough to help. I wish I could get more sleep or have a more consistent sleep schedule. But that's impossible, so I need something like this eye cream to reduce the appearance of dark circles! This saves me so much time in the morning, since I don't have to worry about putting a ton of concealer on.

After applying this product, my eyes do feel moisturized but not greasy. The product absorbs very quickly into my skin. I really dislike when creams make me feel greasy, especially around my eye area, but I don't have to worry about that with this gel! It is very quick and easy to use every night!

This product has many ingredients which are good for your skin, which makes it an insane value because you only need this cream for your eyes. You don't have to worry about applying so many different products, when this is all you need! The components of this eye cream are known for their anti aging and skin brightening benefits! I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
This product is just okay.  I can't rave about it. I will probably order something different next time. It does brighten somewhat but I don't find it moisturizing.
I have used it for about 3 weeks.  Nice eye cream but not a lot of change. I will probably be looking for some other miracle.  Ha Ha
title: Amélie Brightening Eye Cream For Dark Circles, Puffiness, Fine Lines & Wrinkles With Antioxidants, Green Tea & Peptides. Brightens, Depuffs & Firms. Organic & Natural Ingredients.

reviewText: This is the perfect set of tongs. I only have one set of tongs in my kitchen and they are the large ones. They drive me crazy! Other thank taking corn out of a boiling pot of water I find them really annoying. They don't close anymore, so they get caught on everything in the drawer. They also don't have the rubber ends, they are made completely of metal, which means that a lot of things slip out of it. I tested these tongs out and I am in love! I made pasta and used the medium tongs to pick up the spaghetti noodles and shrimp. It worked great. The food didn't slip right through. The rubber ends provide a lot more grip that I could have imagined. It makes it so nice! The large ones are great for pulling corn out of boiling water. I didn't have to worry about the corn slipping out of the tongs when I shook out the excess water. They are also the perfect length to use in a large stock pot. The small ones are nice for condiments like cheese, pickles, olives, etc. The three different sizes are great. I always feel like I need more serving utensils, especially tongs when I'm having people over for dinner. I enjoy the black color. They don't stand out and they look really nice and simple. I love that they open and close so easily. When you push the tab in on the back of the tongs, they open up, when you pull it out, they close tight. They fold down nice and tight and they aren't going to get caught on everything in my kitchen utensil drawer. I throw these in the dishwasher after I use them and they have held up great! *I received this item at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.
Thank you for a great product!!
Even tho they are heavy duty, they do not weigh a lot.  They are well made and I use them almost daily.  The silicone tips are a wonderful addition so much better than those without.
title: Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Premium Kitchen Tongs with Silicone Tips 3 Pack (7, 9, 12 Inch) - FDA Approved Non-Stick for BBQ Cooking Grilling Turner - A Good Serving and Feeding Set for Kitchen - Black

reviewText: I was very excited when I stumbled across this product I pressed buy it now. I engrave and on black or any darker steals the standard blue/black ink can wash out and become very hard to see. So naturally I was like red problem solved and couldn't wait till it came in. Boy was I wrong the red washed out even worse than the standard and I had spent two hours tracing out a drawing I had done and all for not. I know its not intended for this purpose so no fault on there end but total let down on my end...

There's a lot to review here.

First, I was hoping there was some sort of art included. Nope! Just what you see on the box, so 1 star for that.

The tattooing gel is actaullt pretty good. It doesn't get thinner as it warms up like some products do, and creates a good barrier to aid in wiping away ink. Seems almost too thin though. You'll need to constantly reapply. 3 stars.

The stencil transfer gel is ok, but you have to apply twice. Once to prep the area, wipe it away, then again before applying the stencil. Works well with the S8 paper. 4stars.

The stencil transfer sheets however, are great! These come out clean, they print clean, easily applied, and are considerably better than the cheap stuff you can get here on Amazon. I haven't tried Spirit paper yet, but I will definitely buy this paper again. 5 stars.

Overall, this is a pretty good package.
I loved the transfer and tattoo gels, but the transfer goes on a little too light.
description: S8's revolutionary tattoo stenciling system, in one convenient and limited edition system kit box featuring the work of Artist Russ Abbott. What's inside? -RED Tattoo Stencil- A revolutionary red freehand and thermal stencil paper. -RED Stencil Transfer Gel- Prepares and cleans the skin, then acts as a transfer medium. -RED Tattooing Gel- A gel that improves ink saturation, needle performance and reduces inflammation. S8 proudly introduces the RED Tattoo Stencil Transfer System. A new beginning. The first ever red-colored freehand and thermal ready stencil paper. The first ever stencil transfer gel that prepares and protects the skin. The first ever tattooing gel that seals the stencil to the skin and creates a near zero-degree coefficient of drag. All designed to work perfectly in tandem. About the Artist: Russ Abbott is a pioneer. Since he began his tattooing career in 1997, Abbott has become a leader in the American Illustrative tattooing movement. But Abbott is not an easy artist to classify. His tattoos are spectacular pastiches, incorporating subjects from literature and American folk art, baroque stylistic flourishes, and sacred geometries. The constant in Abbotts work is his understanding and application of color theory. The scope of his palette is evident in many of his large illustrative pieces, which demonstrate both his eye for color and his tremendous technical aptitude. Abbott has also been a vocal advocate for the role of digital design and layout in tattooing. He does much of his tattoo design work- from mandalas to outdoor scenes- on computers and has proven the role of software in visualizing tattoos on the body. Abbott owns and tattoos out of Ink & Dagger Tattoo in Georgia, and travels internationally to educate fellow tattooers as well as the general public.
title: Russ Abbott - RED Tattoo Stencil Sampler 25 Sheets of Transfer Paper, 25 Transfer Gels, 25 Tattooing Gels

description:
The Philips Norelco Bodygroom is an all-in-one grooming solution, designed exclusively for men, that safely trims and shaves all body zones. With the Bodygroom, men can trim and shave hair from their chest and abs, underarms, groin area, legs, back and shoulders.


The Philips Norelco Bodygroom is an all-in-one grooming solution for men.
Bodygroom features the latest technology and ergonomic design to offer a convenient, easy and pain-free way to remove and trim body hair. Bodygroom's advanced design is water-resistant and can be used wet or dry -- even in the shower. Its hypo-allergenic foil protects the most sensitive skin against nicks, cuts and other irritation, and its stainless-steel blades ensure long last performance.

Men's body hair is different. It can be coarse and grow in multiple directions, which can make grooming cumbersome and even painful. With the Bodygroom, Norelco has created a new, revolutionary approach to grooming -- men finally have a product designed specifically to meet their unique hair trimming needs.

The Bodygroom comes with many extras, including a cleaning brush that helps keep your Bodygroom neat and tidy, three length attachments for customized grooming, a charging stand, and a hanging cord so you can hang the Bodygroom in the shower. And if grooming on-the-go is important, you'll certainly appreciate the convenient storage and travel pouch that holds your Bodygroom, charger, and all the accessories.

Manufacturer Warranty
The Bodygroom comes with a full 2-year manufacturer warranty.

Philips Norelco Bodygroom Features
Trim & Shave
Bodygroom's dual function shave-and-trim system gives you total control over how much hair you want to remove. Bodygroom comes with three length attachment combs to trim and tidy hair without completely removing it. To remove hair completely, simply use the Bodygroom without any attachments for a close, smooth shave.
Use Wet & Dry
Because Body groom is water-resistant, it is fast and easy to clean, and ideal for use in the shower. It even comes with its own hanging cord so you can keep it close by while bathing. Since Bodygroom can also be used dry, you'll be able to shave and trim anywhere, anytime.
Safe with Less Irritation
Bodygroom's hypo-allergenic shaving foil means a comfortable shave with less irritation -- even on the most sensitive skin and in the most sensitive body zones. Bodygroom allows you to groom your body without worrying about painful nicks and cuts.
Ultra Close Results
Bodygroom's chromium stainless-steel blades deliver ultra close results. The blades ensure long-lasting performance of your Bodygroom and, outside of routine cleaning with the included brush, the Bodygroom is maintenance-free.
What's in the Box
Philips Norelco Body Groom, three length attachments, cleaning brush, charging stand, and carrying case.
<small>*Charging time takes eight hours, and provides up to 50 minutes of cordless use</small>
title: Philips Norelco BG2022 Bodygroom, Limited Edition

reviewText:
I have owned 2 Norelcos over the last 20 years (yes they last that long) and when my last one got tired I decided to replace it with a Remington Titanium 9170. Huge mistake! I returned it after 2 shaves and bought this razor and was hooked during the first use of it. The pivoting heads easily and snugly fit the contours of your face and it gave an excellent first shave that will only get better as the blades break in over the next few weeks. The color is a bit odd and it seemed to take the hand of god to get the trimmer open but those are my only complaints.

 Rotary razors don't work for every type of beard but they work well for me and this is the best I have ever owned. Norelco forever!
It gave me a razor burn sooooooooooooooo bad my girlfriend asked if Satan grabbed my face!

Though this is one of the models in the "lower" groups of Norelco's offerings, it has more than enough bells and whistles.  I really can't see why anyone would need more.  My first shave with this razor ended with the best shave I have ever had in my life.  Just read on and follow all the suggested steps.
Norelco instructs us that all razors of this model should be fully charged for 4 hours before the first shave. I believe that all of Norelco's razors are given if not a full charge, a partial charge.  The manual also explains about the LED lights that indicate the percentage of charged power available to the razor.  When I plugged my razor in for charging, before using, it said 40% available and the 60% indicator was blinking (meaning not quite 60% full).  Give the razor a full 4 hour charge, even if the LEDs say 100% in about 1 hour or so.  Go the full 4 miles the first time around (remember, this razor has a quick charge function, so it may appear to be fully charged, it isn't, it's just your quick charge at work).  I washed my face with plenty of soap and soaked my whiskers with a lot of water.  Then I dried my face completely.  Then, contrary to what Norelco says, I used a liquid preshave conditioner.  Not a gel, not a powder (which should never be done with these razors), simply a liquid.  Then I shaved - - - and it was the best shaving experience I have ever had.
The LED lights tell me everything I need to know - - 20%, 40%, on up to 100% power available.  It starts blinking red at 20% power left.  You can still shave; it's just letting you know that you need to charge it up.  It does have the sideburn trimmer, which I have used and it performed wonderfully for me.
If this is the "lower" line, I don't know what you can do with the higher lines.  I do not see any need for something beyond this razor.  It has its cleaning brush for the razor heads, it has its charging cord, it has its neat little traveling pouch that holds the razor and all its accessories.  What more do you need?
It feels comfortable and well balanced in my hand, it is very quiet, and it is a pleasant razor to look at.  For the price, you cannot possibly go wrong.
description: 6863 XL. Reflex Control automatically adjusts to every curve on your face for flexible, smoother shaving. Individually Floating Heads align the razor sharp blades closer to your skin for exceptional closeness. Patented Lift & Cut Technology dual blade system gently lifts hair to cut comfortably below skin level. Ultra close, ultra comfortable. Feature Level: 5 Stars. Rechargeable cordless/cord razor. 5 LED Battery Meter: Full & low indicators. 6-Minute quick charge. Storage/travel pouch. Shaving System: Individually Floating Heads align the razor sharp blades closer to your skin for exceptional closeness. Improved Patented Lift and Cut Technology dual blade system gently lifts hair to cut comfortably below skin level. Razor automatically adjusts to hug the contours of your face. Features: 6863 XL Rechargeable Cordless/Cord Razor; Rechargeable Cordless/Corded for shaving with or without a cord; 5 LED Battery Charge Meter: Full and Low Indicators; 1-Hour Full Charge for 45 minutes of cordless shaving; 6-Minute Quick Charge for a 3-minute cordless shave; Worldwide Voltage adjusts automatically from 100V to 240V AC; Travel/Storage Pouch, Protective Razor Head Cap, Coil Cord and Cleaning Brush; 5 LED Battery Charge Meter displays charge level in batteries, 20% indicator turns red when razor needs recharging; Razor is fully charged when all indicators turn green; Full width pop-up trimmer is perfect for grooming sideburns and moustache; Complete with Razor, Travel/Storage Pouch, Coil Cord and Cleaning Brush; Replace your Norelco Reflex Plus Razor Heads once a year with model HQ55 plus replacement heads for maximum razor performance. UL Listed. Full 2-Year Warranty.

The top-shelf model in Norelco's Reflex Plus line, this shaver delivers a clean, comfortable shave made even better by high-tech features and lightning-like charge time. The Reflex Plus design combines a multi-directional flexible surface and individually floating heads for contour-hugging action. The shaver also uses Norelco's Lift and Cut technology--45 lifters and 45 blades gently raise whiskers then cut them cleanly for a super smooth, below-the-skin shave. Conveniently designed for corded or cordless use, the shaver produces a whopping 45 minutes of shave time on just a 1-hour charge and 3 minutes on a 6-minute quick charge. A five-LED indicator helps you gauge the battery's juice.

Handsomely finished in a sleek silver casing, the shaver has helpful structural details like a built-in hair chamber and full-width pop-up trimmer. Automatic worldwide voltage adaptability and a sturdy travel pouch make it easy to take on the road, while a protective razor head cap and cleaning brush simplify maintenance. Norelco backs it with a 60-day satisfaction guarantee and a two-year warranty. --Emily Bedard
title: Mens Electric Razor

reviewText: My favorite soap ever.

Shockingly cheesy packaging for the price. Do not know about the product itself, am giving as gift. Had to rebox from flimsy unstable box it came in, quite embarrassing from a gift-giving point of view. Will certainly never have anything to do with this brand again.

Marie Ernst has mastered the art of making fine, skin-nourishing soaps; be sure to read all the details they've provided about their amazing products! I have used both the patchouli and the lemon soaps. These soaps are unique in that they can be assembled like Lego blocks so that there is a pumice (exfoliating) side and a nourishing, super-fatted, moisturizing side. The pumice side is gentle, and can be safely used even over bony areas such as the collarbone without irritating sensitive skin. The moisturizing side is beyond compare for its qualities. When you use it, it doesn't feel like it all rinses off - be assured that it does, that sensation is just the extreme moisturization taking effect! Afterward, my skin feels smoother, more moisturized, and silkier for the rest of the day. This wonderful texture increases with just a little additional everyday moisturizing lotion, but it really is due to the soap.

Don't let the price tag fool you. This soap is just incredible, and I really never thought I'd say this, but it's worth the cost!

Additionally, this gift box is so lovely, truly a beautiful presentation, with the soaps, which are over wrapped, enclosed in elegant sleeves with hand-tied black satin ribbons. reviewText: True Egyptian musk! Stronger than the first 2oz bottle I bought! I'm being asked frequently what is the scent I'm wearing! Seller is very communicative and truly represents quality customer service! I will be definitely buying  more! Thank you!

Egyptian Musk is by far my favorite scent and this is the best I have found. It is so thick and luxurious that a little goes a long way. I don't know if a man should be wearing it, but I am. I burn Egyptian Musk incense in the house and use it in the diffuser in my office. I have looked long and hard to find this high a quality of product, I'm very glad I found it.

I'd never even heard of Egyptian musk before to be honest. Not until I saw someone talking about it online, it intrigued me and I went and did a little snooping on google to get a better idea of it. It's a scented body oil and it's something that has a long history. I thought, well if people have loved that kind of scent for so long it's bound to be worth at least a try. So I decided to try it out by getting the small 2 oz bottle from this seller.

Now, I'm not exactly the biggest perfume user. Most perfume scents don't impress me very much to be honest. They're too strong or they just don't have a scent I like. This on the other hand, this Egyptian musk, surprised me. I took a whiff and instantly loved what I smelled. It smells VERY nice, and it's a scent I actually wouldn't mind wearing which is rare. My mom was also around when I opened the package (which was a LOT of bubble wrap, I had to take out the scissors and even with them it was still a bit of effort to take it off, no problems with damages there lol) and she took a whiff of it as well and then instantly wanted to take the bottle for herself! Considering the fact that my liking a body scented thing this much is rare I told her no, she couldn't have it all. I did give her about a third of it though because I'm not mean.

So basically, the smell is amazing and I can see myself purchasing more when I've run out. Which is a big deal, trust me.

I got this at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review.
title: Egyptian Musk Pure Uncut Scented Body Oil Fragrance Unisex (2 oz)

i will certainly be ordering this again & have not had any skin come off but again i scrub my feet..use this stuff with moisture wicking socks and you are good to go. i know there are extreme cases out there but for most of us this stuff will truly help.

Honestly I can't believe how well this stuff works.  I'm actually able to wear tennis shoes all day long without smelly or over sweating.  I will say I was doubtful when I first got it.  You spray it on and it is pure liquid - not a powder spray like most other foot sprays.  I spray (a bunch of it) over my feet through toes and then put socks on right away to hold in the the stuff.  I do this once a day and have not had any problem with over sweating (you still sweat some) or smelly feet - really a godsend as I used to try all types of other sprays and electrolysis (which didn't work for me).  Highly recommended.

I love these wet n wild Mega Last Lip color lipsticks. They have the staying power of a liquid long lasting lipstick with the creaminess of a stick. The quality of this equals that of luxury brand lipsticks. You can own this for what you would pay in tax for the luxury brand as well. It's also a perfect dupe for Kat Von D's Lolita. It's a rich nude wine color, but not a super a super dark wine color. I'm very fair with black hair, and those dark colors wash me out. This is a berry kissed neutral color. It's super pigmented and a perfect matte shade. This lipstick stays put without feathering. It doesn't last all day. I usually end up reapplying after lunch, and then before going out, which I don't mind. It's not drying like other long lasting lipsticks or liquids. It also blends well with lipsticks and lip glosses. Something other long lasting lipsticks can't do without flaking or getting that gritty texture. I have several shades in this line and have yet to find one that doesn't work for me. It's the perfect everyday lipstick and priced where you can buy one for your home, your purse, and your desk.

reviewText: Didn't like it at all. Not for Mixed hair.

I used this conditioner and followed with the oil and it did an amazing job. I have dry limp hair that is always greasy on top so I have been skeptical of "cleansing conditioners" because most do not cleanse well enough for me. This did the job and the system even minimized split ends that were previously there. Very pleased.

I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest unbiased review. I'm an African-American female with kinky coily hair, very particular of my haircare regime. I'm not sure of my exact type, I just know my hair is the type that thrives on moisture. I never go longer than one week without cleansing my strands and sometimes I cleanse every other day. My scalp is very sensitive though with too much shampooing becomes irritated. Co-washing (using conditioner to clean my hair instead of shampoo) has become routine for me and I am constantly looking for conditioning cleansers that perform their best on my hair; maintaining moisture and not stripping natural oils. I found Pomifera Cleansing Conditioner on Amazon and decided to give it a try. Almost immediately I was hooked.  One of one of the main things that caught my attention to this product was the fact that it is Sulfate, Paraben, Gluten, & Phosphate free. Pomifera Conditioner produced teeny-tiny bubbles that seemed to help me detangle my hair as I cleansed it. I used a routine much as I would with a regular shampoo. My hair was clean, was not weighted down, and left with a nice fresh citrus smell. I ABSOLUTELY recommend this conditioner for my natural-haired divas.

reviewText: I am really liking this product. I first tried the vitamin e oil, and after feeling encouraged by the results of that product, I wanted to give this cleanser a try. I have had rather bad acne for some time (since middle school), and now that I am in my mid 20s I have been really searching desperately for something to help reduce my acne. Other products I've tried in the past for acne have generally been quite typically chemically based, and usually have not helped much to reduce my acne much at all, and have also very often caused more discomfort (redness, itchiness, or similar reactions). So I was really glad to see a more natural based product. I've been using this cleanser for about two weeks now, and it has been great. It hasn't caused any negative reactions at all, and instantly helps remove the excess oiliness from my skin without drying it out or causing redness like other products. It is very gentle, and my face always feels so refreshed after using it. Very pleasant! In terms of my acne, while it of course has not caused it to disappear completely or shown a particularly dramatic improvement thus far, I do really feel that it is making some difference. My skin and face feel calmer and less inflamed to me. I wash my face with it in the morning and evening and also occasionally use the vitamin e oil to moisturizer my skin in the evenings. I think that it will continue to make at the very least a subtle difference in helping my acne, and certainly seems very promising in terms of keeping my face and skin more healthy. My face also seems to feel very noticeably softer and smoother since I began using this cleanser (and also the vitamin e oil). So I am very pleased and plan to purchase more!! Thanks!
really good
Smells great. Works great. Have been using the product for seven days already and people are already noticing a difference in my skin tone.
title: 100% Natural Vitamin E Facial Cleanser. Best ever face wash for dry to oily skin. Anti-acne & anti-blemish clearing cleansers better than soap

reviewText:
It is the best cure for cankers sores that I have used.  I am 70 yrs old and have been bother by cankers sores for 50 yrs.  I have tried many different things to help with the pain of cankers sores. This is the best
I have used.

After a dental cleaning visit one of my tooth gum tissue got infected. There was pus from the gum, the gum tissue inflamed/swelled to about twice its size and the tooth loosening. I do not know whether the gum was healing or not, but if so, it was very slow barely changing in a week. Kept my mouth meticulously clean during this time. Always mouthwash (several types, stabilized clorine dioxide and Listerine) after food goes into my mouth, brushed after meals and flossed.

Had to immediately do something about it because I was worried that I would lose that tooth. Used Gingigel and within 12 hours, the pus was gone. After fours days the swelling and redness has gone down to 80% now only barely noticeable in a small area. This product definitely works since nothing really noticeable was happening, then whamo, the gum healed up in a few days.

There is a loss of gum tissue between this tooth and the adjacent one, so I am hoping that it will help regrow the gum tissue as well (I've read that HA does work for this). Another wish is that HA will help my gums attach itself to my teeth. I have had deep pocket cleanings but the pockets never seem to go away. The only way the bacteria would not be able to get back into the pockets is if the gum reattached to the teeth.

I will update in several months if my gum between my teeth grows back and that the pockets are better with the next dental appointment.
DONT KNOW IF IT WORKS  TUBE IS VERY SMALL AND THE OPENING IS TINY NOT MUCH COMES OUT

reviewText: Excellent soap, nice, subtle fragrance, good exfoliating oatmeal, slightly abrasive, which I like. The soap lasts reasonably well, despite being of only medium size. My only knock is the price for a bar of this soap, but handmade soap does seem to fetch a premium price. If you want good exfoliating soap with subtle fragrance and price doesn't put you off, go for it. For me, I'll probably stick with Trader Joe's oatmeal soap.

This is a wonderful soap! Albeit a little smaller than I expected. The Honey Oatmeal aroma is invigorating. The fact that it is all organic makes it an excellent choice for family use. Every member of my family has thoroughly enjoyed using this. The ingredients are evident when looking at the bar. One of the main benefits I have noticed is that there is no residue left in the soap holder after use. That tells me that it will last longer, and we will be able to use every last ounce. I highly recommend this brand and "flavor".

In accordance with Amazon policy, it should be noted I received this item for free, or at a discounted rate, in exchange for a fair, honest, and unbiased review. My reviews are my own and based solely on my personal experience with the item. It is in no way affected by the discount received or the seller.

What a treat!  Having issues with psoriasis and dealing with constantly dry, itchy skin, I'm at the point where I will try anything for some relief.  Oatmeal has hydrating and exfoliating properties, and I already knew how beneficial it is for soothing irritated skin.  I love that this is a natural product, so I don't have to worry about harsh chemicals making things worse.  I also love cloves, and the spicy addition to the sweet honey makes it smell as good as it feels.  I certainly don't expect this soap to cure my skin issues, but it does make things a little more bearable.  And if all else fails, at least I can enjoy the relaxing benefits.

I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: My favorite color of nail polish.  Looks great with a tan also.

I received a 3 oz Probelle Nail Lacquer in In Or Out as part of my Ipsy monthly subscription. Well, it is not my color nor is it for anyone that isn't a fan of pastels. I cant image wearing this lackluster lavender shade generally at work as it is not a professional shade nor is it vibrant enough to be trend setting. I think it is a color best reserved for young girls; I cant image a setting this color would work in other than that. That said, let me talk about the good aspects because I did try this on my toes for no other reason than to test the product. First, this is top-notch for a nail polish that doesnt have a chemical overpowering stench. It smells like nail polish, but doesnt pollute the entire room. First application was very smooth, not too thick, a bit on the watery side. You definitely need to apply the two standard shades. Dries faster than average, only took about 2 minutes before it was dry to the touch, applied evenly and with minimal fuss. In summary, recommend the product but would only try in a different shade.
My new favorite nail polish. Longer holding power and vivid colors.
description: High Quality Long Lasting Nail Lacquer for a long lasting manicure.

reviewText:
I recently purchased teh ARcitec product to replace my Norelco XL shaver.
I have used Norelco electric razors for over 20 years and find that the arcitec razor is the worst performing electric razor that i have ever used.
In particular, shaving around the neck area has been the most difficult area for the razor to take care of.
I would not recommend this razor to anyone

The plusses include and incredibly close shave and and an extremely eficient cleaning system--each rotary blade is complete accessible to running tap water. But--the shaver body is light weight and flimsy feeling and fits slightly awkwardly in my hand--its tapered body always wants to shift downwards and I end up holding it close to the shaving heads and then press too heavily; it sounds like a wind up toy; the trimmer is silly in terms of size, efficiency and convenience. Probably if I'd seen this razor it in a retail store and had the opportunity to get its 'hand feel' I wouldn't have bought it. The Norelco 'Jame Bond' surpasses this model across the board. I have another 40+ days and still may return the 1060, but every time I use it I continue to enjoy it
3+ stars worth and will likely keep it. But I encourage buyers not to forget the easy return policy and hold on to your original sales receipt to keep all options available.

The development of the arcitec shaver began as a challenge from Phillips' management to its engineers to create a razor that would finally convince users of conventional razors to turn electric. Although the shaving closeness does not match that of a Gillette razor 100% (and perhaps no electric shaver ever will), the results are considered stunning and revolutionary for an electric razor. The design and build are also very modern and trendy, and its an overall worthwhile investment for frequent travelers or anyone who dislikes wet shaving.
description: Norelco is evolving into Arcitec and it's a wonderful experience for your face. The 1060 is like the Maserati of shavers. From distinctive style to close, shaving somfort, it rides your contours precisely. Designed for JVC Everio Camcorders - Compatible with GZ-HD7 and GZ-MG555 models

Offering a 360 degree swiveling shaving head and a state-of-the art sleek design, arcitec is the most advanced Philips Norelco shaver yet. Compared to other Philips Norelco shavers, arcitec offers new flex & pivot technology, a more aerodynamic design, and an advanced tube trimmer.

The unique flex & pivot technology delivers an exceptionally close shave. Three individually flexing shaving heads are connected by a ball joint system making them swivel, rotate, and pivot with a full range of motion. The maneuverability allows arcitec to adjust to the contours of your face ensuring optimum skin contact and a closer shave -- even on the neck. The new arcitec Shaver is designed to push the boundaries of shaving and to conquer those hard to shave areas.

The arcitec 1060 comes encased in a sophisticated silver chrome shell. Drawing inspiration from scientific and specialized instruments, this shaver is built with high density, lightweight materials. You know you are shaving with something extraordinary.

Cutting edge innovation doesn't stop with the shaver. Now you can recharge your shaver while you store it, with the Power Pod travel case that plugs into the wall and protects your investment. While at home, you can recharge your razor in its sleek stand and show off this modern addition to your bathroom shelf.

For those sideburns, goatees and moustaches, the new patented precision tube trimmer cuts hairs closer to the skin. This improved performance is due to the tube cutting system moving back and forth capturing every hair. All of these improvements and new introductions make it possible for you to conquer your neck to look and feel your best! Chart your course with the new Philips Norelco arcitec and be confident you're getting a perfectly close shave -- even on the neck.

Flex and Pivot Technology: Three independently flexing heads in a shaving unit that swivels 360 degrees for a full range of motion. This ensures optimum skin contact in curved areas, to catch even the most problematic hairs on your neck for a perfectly close shave, even in the hard to shave places.
       State-of-the-Art Design: arcitec's 'central drive' technology makes it possible to design an ultra slim ergonomic body that fits snugly in your hand -- making it more comfortable to hold and effortless to use. The central drive technology connects all rotary blades to the shaving motor using only one spindle (axle) for a more comfortable grip.
Triple Track Shaving Heads: with up to 50% more shaving surface for a faster, smoother, closer shave. The Philips arcitec has more blades than traditional single-track shaving heads for more chances to catch and cut hair on every stroke. So you don't have to go over the same area to get a really close shave.
Superior Lift & Cut®Technology: The dual stainless steel blade system gently lifts hair to cut it comfortably below skin level, for an ultra close shave.
Advanced Tube Trimmer: Extends out from the body of the shaver -- perfect for trimming your sideburns, goatee, moustache -- then slide it back into the shaver to keep that sleek clean look! The new patented precision tube trimming technology lets you cut off hairs closer to the skin. The outer tube has slots to catch hairs and the inner tube oscillates to cut these hairs.
Precision Cutting System: Ultra-thin heads have slots to catch longer hairs and holes to shave short stubble. The stainless steel shaving heads are made very thin so they lie closer than ever against your skin to reach every hair.
Washable: Simply rinses clean in seconds -- for the ultimate in convenience.
Other standard features include:
  • Multi-Purpose Display: Battery Full and Charging Indicators, Shaving Head Replacement and Cleaning Indicator
  • Charging Stand
  • Power Pod Charging Storage Case (ideal for travel)
  • Fully charges in 1-hour for up to 65 minutes of shave time or 21 days of cord-free shaving
  • 3-Minute Quick Charge
  • Automatic Worldwide Voltage
  • Electronic On/Off Switch
  • Hair Collection Chamber
  • Protective Razor Cap
  • Cleaning Brush
  • Every Philips Norelco shaver has a 60-Day Money-Back Guarantee and a Full Two-Year Warranty.
title: Philips Norelco arcitec 1060 Men's Shaving System

WOW, I am speechless. But since that is not a good thing when writing a review, I will try to be verbose instead.
I have very sensitive skin and because of this, shaving has always been a real chore. Even with the best manual razors from Gillette, the Mach 3 or even the Schick Protector and FX (both tripled bladed also), I could never achieve a close confortable shave. A couple of years ago I decided to give up the blade and try an electric razor. I did all my research and at that time, at least via Consumers Guides, EPINIONS, and other web sites the top of the line Panasonic got top reviews. So I bought one. Boy what a mistake that was for me. It never gave me a close shave and after about 18 months, of use, I had to repace the blade and foil which was about 50% of the cost and this lead me to my new NORELCO Advantage.
Wow, What a difference! The instructions stated it would take 3 weeks for the hair on my face to  get trained to the Norelco method, but not in my case. My first shave was PERFECT...Even those hard to reach places; like under your lips or below the adam's apple  came out hairless. I could never achieve results like this with the other razors, blade or electric. And although some might think that having the built in preshave is a gimmick, I like it, it is one less thing to pack when you are traveling, and its there in a pinch, without loosing your shaving momentum. And since I never plan on growing a beard or mustache, the multi beard controls of the other Norelcos did not appeal to me. So guys, if you have any fathers day money left over, I highly suggest giving your face a break and trying one.
Good razor for the price.

Every face is different and I tried this Norelco both wet and dry but it did not give me a close shave at all. Admitedly I have a tough beard and sensitive skin so between the two I had a lot of razor burn and more stuble than reasonable. I ended up buying the Panasonic LT-41 and for my face it is wonderful. ALmost no burn and the closet shave I've ever had with an electric shaver - darn near as good as a top of the line blade.

If the Norelco works for your face shape and beard then great. I would not recommend it without a 3-week test drive as I don't think it's all that great of shaver. The gel is expensive too and it didn't deliver for me.
description: Norelco's Advantage Wet / Dry Shaving System, can be used dry or in the shower, for unsurpassed comfort and closeness, Bonus Steam-Free Mirror included!

Looking for a cordless shaver that offers a clean shave in any environment? Look no further. The Advantage shaver was designed for use wet or dry, at the sink or in the shower. Need shaving cream? Pop a cartridge of Nivea shaving gel under the back hatch, and you’re ready to go; simply press the button and the shaver dispenses the gel automatically. Norelco’s patented Lift and Cut technology and self-sharpening blades insure that you’ll never get anything less than a clean, close shave. Individual floating heads adjust to your face and beard. When you’re through shaving, just rinse the shaver clean under the faucet. An overnight charge of eight hours yields 40 minutes of shaving time. Automatic worldwide voltage makes it the ideal travel partner. The Advantage comes with a charging stand with charging indicator light, six cartridges of Nivea lotion, and a two-year warranty against defects. --Chris deMaagd
title: Norelco 6735XB Advantage Rechargeable Cordless Wet / Dry Shaving System with Bonus Steam-Free Shower Mirror

description:
The Sigma Beauty Sigma Spa Brush Cleaning Glove was specially designed as a quick, easy and effective method to deep clean your makeup brush collection. The revolutionary device offers a variety of necessary textures and surfaces for removing all makeup from brushes while using only a small amount of cleaning solution. The dual-sided glove provides a complete cleaning process for both eye and face brushes. Patent pending.

Brush Cleaning How-To:
1. WASH - Add a small amount of cleaning solution and water to glove and swirl brush on Wash texture to begin deep cleaning the brush(es).
2. RINSE - Place brush under running water and sweep brush back and forth on the Rinse texture of the glove to remove makeup residue & soap.
3. REFINE - Swirl brush on the Refine texture of the glove for an added deep cleaning
4. RINSE - Place brush under running water & sweep brush back and forth on the Rinse texture for a final rinse.
5. SHAPE - Reshape brush bristles by placing brush head on the Shape section of the glove while squeezing with your hand to remove excess water.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC
title: Sigma Spa Brush Cleaning Glove - Pink

reviewText: Ordered for mother and she is impressed with how they help her dentures stay secure.

Snug has the feel and texture of Cushion EZ. It's a soft, spongy rubber type material. I set aside 30 minutes or so to do a rough cut, then work it down into the denture. I then bite down on it for 10 minutes or so and then trim the excess on the outer edges and wear the dentures for the rest day. By the next day I know the cushion has bonded with the denture and I can then use adhesive (I prefer cream over powder). The cushion lasts me a month for the top and 2 weeks for the bottom. In my opinion Snug is better than the plastic feeling of Ezo and less messy to deal with then Cushion EZ. I still use overnight denture cleansers and it doesn't seem to affect the performance of cushions.
Thank you
title: Snug Denture Cushions - 2 ea by Mentholatum
